StringTable.String: Launch a save the Snuggler campaign.

StringTable.Label: Event_CollapsingIceBridge_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Rescue the Snugglers and relocate them to our warehouses.

StringTable.Label: Event_CollapsingIceBridge_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let nature take its course. If any Snugglers survive, collect them when it is safe.

StringTable.Label: Event_WaterReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: A new source of subterranean water has been discovered on {PLANETNAME}. If accessed it could dramatically help the colony. The water could be used to boost food production or even just people's quality of life. Baths might be possible again, for example. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_WaterReclamation_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Discontinue the colony's water restrictions and let people enjoy it.

StringTable.Label: Event_WaterReclamation_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Don't be wasteful with this bounty. Direct all the water to irrigating the fields.

StringTable.Label: Event_WaterReclamation_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the local gangs to control the water supply in exchange for a kickback.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scorpions_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is populated by a species of gigantic subterranean insects that are normally docile. Our scientists have identified that the walls of their nests are lined with Harmony Crystals which we could potentially excavate. This will not please the scorpions. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Scorpions_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Giant scorpions are more useful than crystals. Treat them well.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scorpions_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Collect the limited crystals we can without disturbing the scorpions.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scorpions_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Crush the insects. Take their valuables.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousNatives_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} has a group of natives who carry relics far more advanced than their primitive technology. Their oral history gives hints that they arrived here from a long journey some hundreds of years earlier. Your scientists get the impression they're a failed colony which has regressed to pre-industrial levels. It's possible some of their relics could be of interest to your researchers, but they're quite valuable to the natives. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousNatives_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Leave the natives be, but begin documenting their fascinating history.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousNatives_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite the natives to join our colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousNatives_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: These trinkets are better in our hands than theirs.

StringTable.Label: Event_Mutations_Dec
StringTable.String: Despite the equipment and protocols set up to protect against the massive radiation on {PLANETNAME}, mutations are a fact of life for those who live here. A talented local surgeon believes that the most extreme cases might not be worth the time spent to heal them. Instead he suggests that we use those subjects as organ harvest donors for the less critical patients. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Mutations_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Never. All our citizens deserve the best possible care.

StringTable.Label: Event_Mutations_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It is a reasonable request. And we can make money from organ sales.

StringTable.Label: Event_Mutations_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I like the way this surgeon thinks. Promote him into a government role.

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiation_Dec
StringTable.String: The intense background radiation of {PLANETNAME} occasionally causes strange interference patterns in display screens around your colony; and recently these patterns have shown signs of intelligent thought. Your scientists trace the patterns to crystal outcroppings around your colony. [BR][BR]Studying this new form of intelligence could open the door to incredible breakthroughs in the understanding of life. On the other hand, those crystals are pretty valuable looking. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiation_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Attempt to communicate with the crystals.

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiation_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Study the crystals to find out what's happening.

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiation_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The crystals are valuable. Mine and sell them.

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiationSuccess_Dec
StringTable.String: The crystals of {PLANETNAME} continue to grow; the radiation increases until a single moment when it bursts into a blinding light. For a moment people across the galaxy report visions of other worlds, of other species, and of time itself. When it is over the crystals are gone but explorers are drawn to this world to study what happened.

StringTable.Label: Event_IntelligentRadiationFail_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't interfere with the crystals on {PLANETNAME}. Whatever the crystals needed to grow, they don't receive it. Instead they become dull and grey; and the radiation fades as well. You can't help but feel that something special died here.

StringTable.Label: Event_MiningAccidents_Dec
StringTable.String: Your geologists have come across an incredibly rich vein of rare minerals which could dramatically increase the economic output of {PLANETNAME}. Unfortunately, accessing them will release toxic gases trapped within the planet's crust. The colonists ask that these minerals be left alone. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_MiningAccidents_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Do what we can to extract the minerals safely.

StringTable.Label: Event_MiningAccidents_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Mine it all. Rare minerals are rare in a way that people aren't.

StringTable.Label: Event_FunnyTastingFood_Dec
StringTable.String: Food grown on {PLANETNAME} has a distinct taste. Locals don't notice anything unusual, but off-world visitors find it exceedingly strange and even exotic tasting. Of late, the outside world has developed a faddish taste for this colony's food, and there has been much demand for the export of it, even to the point of leaving this colony short of food. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_FunnyTastingFood_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite more colonists to the planet to increase production.

StringTable.Label: Event_FunnyTastingFood_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use all available fertile land to grow more of the strange food.

StringTable.Label: Event_FunnyTastingFood_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This isn't food, it's revenue. Export everything for sale.

StringTable.Label: Event_LeakingSeals_Dec
StringTable.String: A sudden increase in storm activity on {PLANETNAME} has dramatically increased the weathering of the seals on your colony buildings. A new generation of self-healing seals will help minimize the damage, but replacing them all could be pretty expensive. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_LeakingSeals_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Install the new seals, whatever the cost.

StringTable.Label: Event_LeakingSeals_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Install seals as the old ones break down.

StringTable.Label: Event_LeakingSeals_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can't afford that, this is what the colonists signed up for.

StringTable.Label: Event_BeautifulSunsets_Dec
StringTable.String: The atmosphere of {PLANETNAME}, thick with poisonous particulates, does have the side effect of causing beautiful, even spectacular sunsets, and word has spread through the galaxy of their beauty. A burgeoning tourist industry has developed, resulting in many coughing tourists, ignorant of the dangers of this planet. Your colonists are getting tired of stepping over their bodies. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_BeautifulSunsets_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regulate this new industry. We can't kill our guests.

StringTable.Label: Event_BeautifulSunsets_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Inform tourists of the danger and provide safety gear.

StringTable.Label: Event_BeautifulSunsets_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make the deaths look like they came from partying.

StringTable.Label: Event_BlackMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: There is an illegal black market operating on {PLANETNAME}. It is a haven for pirates and smugglers. They warmly receive our colonists, sharing maps of the planet and seem appreciative of the support and protection our colony provides. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_BlackMarket_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The smugglers have a day to relocate. After that, arrest them.

StringTable.Label: Event_BlackMarket_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The market can remain, but our laws will be enforced.

StringTable.Label: Event_BlackMarket_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the market to continue to operate, this can benefit us as well.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Long ago, the Precursors captured a small Thulium node and placed it in orbit of {PLANETNAME}. We will be able to use this ready source of Thulium to strengthen the hit points of ships made from our shipyard. Our scientists would also like to study it to see what else we can learn. Technology that can be used to create an artificial moon is not something to be squandered. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use this technology to strengthen our ships.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the moon as a weapons platform.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: An ancient Precursor race seems to have once inhabited {PLANETNAME}. They left behind a cloud of Durantium asteroids that are now orbiting the world. We will be able to use these to increase the efficiency of the Mass Drivers on our ships. However, we may also be able to use this ready source of Durantium for other purposes. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the Durantium to increase the production of this planet.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the Durantium to increase the armor efficiency on all of our ships.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the Durantium to focus on what's important: killing things.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: An immense Precursor Accelerator is orbiting {PLANETNAME}. We have been able to tap this device to create even more powerful drive systems. All of our ships built here will benefit from a great increase in speed. Some of our scientists think they can use the accelerator to refine Elerium as well, and would like to do some experimentation. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the Elerium to create a defense field for the colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use this Elerium to increase the strength of our shield systems.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Put our energy toward making bigger explosions.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors who lived on {PLANETNAME} before us left behind a completely functional Space Elevator. This will greatly increase our ability to put manufactured goods into space and will prove very useful to our shipyard. Unfortunately, the public sector and several other groups are putting a great deal of pressure on us. They hope to use the elevator to facilitate their own projects. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They can use it as a vacation spot, as long as they don't block military traffic.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow some traders time on the Elevator.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: If they have spare time, they can lend it to the war effort.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Two giant Precursor structures orbit the poles of {PLANETNAME}. They seem to have been used to somehow terraform a Promethion gas giant into a habitable world. We are able to use the Promethion stored in them to increase the range of any ships built by our shipyard. Our scientists think they can do more with these giant machines and would like your permission to study them further. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See if they can find a way to terraform the surface.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See if there is any way to boost the value of the land we have now.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See what you can do to shut the complainers up. We have a galaxy to conquer.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The former Precursor inhabitants left a large array of powerful satellites in orbit of {PLANETNAME}. We have been able to make use of them to extend both the sensor range of the planet and of the ships that are built here. Our researchers would like to capture one of these satellites for study and have assured us that it will not have any damaging effects on the array. A group of Navigator scientists has also shown an interest in investigating the satellites. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Focus on using the satellites to increase our sensor range.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Put engines on the satellite and transform it onto a starbase.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite scientists to come research the satellites.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is surrounded by an immense Precursor ring. It's full of valuable assets that could be used to generate income. Unfortunately, it has already drawn the attention of multiple criminal groups that are harvesting the ring and fighting with each other. Although the pirates are no real threat to us, it will take a lot of work to guard against their constant attempts to harvest the ring. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Focus on protecting the ring. Destroy any pirates that get too close.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make a deal with the pirates. They can harvest the ring and we get a cut.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite them to join the colony and give them rights to the ring.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Through intense research, we have been able to use the ancient Precursor Factory orbiting {PLANETNAME} to increase our manufacturing output. Several members of the research team responsible for this have come forward with suggestions on how we can utilize this amazing new asset. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the excess manufacturing to improve the quality of life on this world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Remove some of the safety measures on the factory to boost the output.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient array of Precursor research bases orbiting {PLANETNAME} are increasing the Research capacity for this world. Our researchers would like permission to see if they can find a way to specialize the focus of these new assets. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Prepare the array to complete research on a single technology for us.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the array to manage our bureaucracy.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have cleaned the atmosphere, we can use the infrastructure of Precursor Prisons to increase the manufacturing quality of {PLANETNAME}. However, there seem to be many more discoveries that are... darker in nature. Echoes of the millions that died within the vast underground chambers. Should we take advantage of these assets? What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Focus on building up our colony, not the dark past of this world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Pre-made haunted murder cubes? Start moving people in!

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Start shipping criminals from across our empire here for storage.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The giant Precursor Experimental Station orbiting {PLANETNAME} has become an amazing resource that is assisting the ability of this planet to create new devices. We have also found some interesting experiments that we may be able to complete with some extra work. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Cleaning up the atmosphere of {PLANETNAME} has shown it to be amazingly productive and resource rich. Our researchers have been studying the Precursor Containment Device that's orbiting the planet and think they can use it to further enhance this world's potential. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Focus on making this planet as comfortable for our colonists as possible.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use these technologies to increase the food capacity of the world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Increase the amount of usable land. We can make more people later.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeMars_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is an inhospitable home for organic life with the challenges of radiation exposure, toxic soil and low gravity. Still, we have identified three potential locations for colonies on the planet.[BR][BR]Ares Vallis is where Sojourner, the first Terran explorer outside of Earth, landed.[BR][BR]Eberswalde Delta is a delta in a delta.[BR][BR]Holden Crater has signs of microbial life that may indicate that the region is more suited for organic life.[BR][BR]Where would you like to build our colony?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeMars_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Ares Vallis, where Sojourner once landed.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeMars_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Eberswalde Delta, where we can extract additional minerals.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeMars_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Holden Crater, where we can study signs of microbial life.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeArtemis_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is as inhospitable as we have seen so far. It is cold, barren and has a limited atmosphere and gravity. Still, our colony is deployed successfully and our colonists quickly set to turning this minor planet into a new home. It is an example of what our courage and ingenuity are able to accomplish. One corporation is very interested in {PLANETNAME} and offers a generous fee if we will allow them exclusive licensing rights to the fledgling colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeArtemis_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should celebrate this achievement across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeArtemis_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make this world a monument to our success and future expansion.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonizeArtemis_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the corporation to license rights to the colony.

StringTable.Label: Basic_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] Doubles Moves of Fleet [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] +50% fleet Hit Points [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] +25% Logistics

StringTable.Label: Admiral_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] 25% All Weapons in Fleet [ICON=ShipsDefendingWorldIcon] 25% All Defenses in Fleet

StringTable.Label: Martyr_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: Upgrades flagship to Martyr class. Destroys any enemy fleet it comes into contact with (destroys friendly fleet too).

StringTable.Label: Intimidator_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: Upgrades flagship to Intimidator class. Targets enemy fleet bonuses.

StringTable.Label: Sovereign_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: Upgrades flagship to Sovereign class. Target enemy fleet is changed to be owned by the League of Non-Aligned Planets. Sovereign ship is sacrificed.

StringTable.Label: Exterminator_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: Converts a command ship to a Spore ship, capable of wiping out the entire population of an undefended planet.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Dec
StringTable.String: We have received a report that you chose to destroy some 'bugs' on planet {PLANETNAME}. That was one of our hatcheries! We will make you pay for this!

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: It seemed like a good idea at the time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will be troubled for awhile.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Name
StringTable.String: Using pods to enslave your own people

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Dec
StringTable.String: Our surveillance systems indicate that you forced sentient beings into pods on planet {PLANETNAME}. These pods have rendered them into a state of mindless servitude. Such actions challenge the very essence of sentience and sapience. Your actions will not go unnoticed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: In our view, it was necessary.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will deteriorate significantly.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomaticDrugFallout_Dec
StringTable.String: Your encouragement of the consumption of this powerful drug on planet {PLANETNAME} has led to a tragic event. The family member of a prominent member of our civilization was exposed to its addictive nature, and their life was cut short. [BR][BR]The gravity of this situation has been felt deeply within our diplomatic circles.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomaticDrugFallout_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are in a precarious state.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Dec
StringTable.String: You dared to steal the Cosmic Eye from planet {PLANETNAME}. That ancient Precursor relic was under our protection and vital for our navigational endeavors. [BR][BR]Such brazen actions will have consequences.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: It held untapped potential for us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will remain strained for some time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Dec
StringTable.String: On planet {PLANETNAME}, you unleashed sonic weapons, killing our larval cousins. Those were younglings of our insectoid civilization. Your actions have deeply disturbed us, and retribution is in the air.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We perceived them as a threat.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now fraught with tension.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Dec
StringTable.String: You have taken the semi-intelligent marsupial creatures of planet {PLANETNAME} and forced them into slavery. These beings are cherished within our circles, and your actions have invoked our wrath.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We saw potential for their strength.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been damaged.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Dec
StringTable.String: On planet {PLANETNAME}, you slaughtered our kind -- the sentient crystals. Every shard broken is a life lost, a consciousness silenced. The echoes of this atrocity will reverberate through the universe, and our anguish is boundless.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We were unaware of their sentience.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are shattered, much like the crystals you destroyed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ToxicDelicacy_Dec
StringTable.String: The addictive food that you started exporting from planet {PLANETNAME} has reached our populations.[BR][BR]Its addictive properties have led to sickness and desperation among our people. This is an unforgivable act of negligence!

StringTable.Label: Quest_ToxicDelicacy_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now severely strained due to this oversight.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DigitalDelight_Dec
StringTable.String: While organic civilizations suffered due to the addictive food from {PLANETNAME}, we are very pleased with your plan to ruin organic lives. We thank you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DigitalDelight_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Oh. Yes. That was our evil plan all along.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SealNegligence_Dec
StringTable.String: Your failure to address the leaking seals on planet {PLANETNAME} has directly led to severe damage to one of our kind. [BR][BR]While you fleshlings may not see this as a problem, we will not forget it. This negligence is not acceptable, and it strains our relationship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SealNegligence_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now compromised due to this negligence.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Dec
StringTable.String: Your support of the black market on {PLANETNAME} hasn't gone unnoticed. Our agents thrive, and our profits surge. We value such partnerships.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We recognize mutual benefits. That was totally our intention.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been significantly boosted due to this profitable association.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Name
StringTable.String: Our citizen was harmed on your planet

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Dec
StringTable.String: During our visit to your factory on {PLANETNAME}, one of our members was inadvertently deactivated due to the safety measures you removed. We question your judgment on this!

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been strained due to this unfortunate incident.

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Dec
StringTable.String: A cousin from one of our most respected families was injured while touring your factory on {PLANETNAME}, due to the safety measures you removed. This incident is gravely concerning to us!

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We never intended harm to your kin.

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have deteriorated due to this grievous event.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Dec
StringTable.String: Our trading partners on Artemis are singing praises of your leadership. The flourishing businesses on the planet are greatly benefiting our entrepreneurial ventures.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Prosperity through partnership is our aim.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been bolstered by the thriving trade on Artemis.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to letting your corporations running wild on Artemis, we've managed to gain a significant advantage in our endeavors. Every opportunity is a path to dominance, and you've provided us a great one.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Every opportunity seized brings us closer to prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} find common ground in seizing opportunities.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography has shed light on your pacifist principles. This resonates deeply with us. We see you as a beacon of hope in these turbulent times.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Peace is the true path forward.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} gains trust among pacifist civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography speaks of your insatiable curiosity and passion for exploration. We, who cherish the thrill of discovery, find a kin spirit in you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: The universe is vast and full of wonders.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} is viewed favorably among exploratory civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography details a thirst for conquest, a quality we find commendable and worthy of respect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: The stars are for those who have the might to claim them.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2}'s ambitions are recognized and appreciated by warrior civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Name
StringTable.String: Dismay at your blood lust desires

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography speaks of a hunger for conquest and dominance. Such bloodlust has deeply troubled us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Peace is the true path to prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Aggressive ambitions of {PLAYERFACTION:2} disturb peaceful civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Name
StringTable.String: You are a rising crime lord

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Dec
StringTable.String: You are rising as a criminal power thanks to your work on {PLANETNAME}. We should discuss potential ventures.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Our reputation among criminal entities has improved.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Dec
StringTable.String: Your actions on {PLANETNAME} have been noted. The native population was enslaved under your directive. We are deeply disturbed by this behavior, questioning your civilization's integrity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Our actions are for the greater good of our people.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will be significantly strained due to this incident.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Name
StringTable.String: You are our kind of evil

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Dec
StringTable.String: The shrewdness with which you enslaved the stupid natives of {PLANETNAME} has not gone unnoticed. We appreciate such strategic brilliance. You may yet find allies among us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Of course. I shall now laugh maniacally as is my way.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Your actions have garnered favor with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Dec
StringTable.String: Your compassionate actions on {PLANETNAME} resonate with the higher cosmic order. We commend your choice to see the divine light in the less advanced and nurture it. The galaxy will remember.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: All beings deserve respect and kindness.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have taken notice of your actions, strengthening the bond with us.

StringTable.Label: EndGameCredits_57_Text
StringTable.String: Galactic Civilizations is a registered trademark of Stardock Entertainment. All rights reserved.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_COLONY_DESC
StringTable.String: With the establishment of this colony, we have taken our first steps into the galaxy. Our colonists represent everything which makes our people great, and with that they'll have every chance of thriving on this new alien world.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_DURANTIUM_DESC
StringTable.String: Our miners have returned with rocky debris laced with a telltale flicker of silvery-gold: Durantium. More dense and resilient than anything we've seen before, a steady supply will surely lead to new breakthroughs in ship design.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_ELERIUM_DESC
StringTable.String: An unnatural glow fills the mining ship as it draws in the first batch of the mysterious substance, Elerium. It is a material that seems to amplify high energy systems. It will be vital for high energy beam weapons and certain domestic applications.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_PROMETHION_DESC
StringTable.String: The first group of our probes have returned with canisters containing trace amounts of Promethion. Trace amounts by necessity, as the material is incredibly unstable. It will prove vital for our research efforts across a wide variety of applications.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_THULIUM_DESC
StringTable.String: Thulium is not much to look at, surprisingly dull in texture and color. It's only in higher dimensions that it shows its true character, a stable form of Neutronium, a material of enormous density. This will be a vital component for any number of new systems.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_ANTIMATTER_DESC
StringTable.String: The first of our antimatter mining probes (little more than an engine with a scoop) returns from the perimeter of a black hole with its precious cargo. The antimatter it has collected will soon be put to use developing advanced weapon and power generation systems.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_TRADE_ROUTE_DESC
StringTable.String: With minimal ceremony, the first of your trading frigates pushes away from its slip. When it returns, it will contain a small portion of the galaxy's wealth, the first in what will surely be a long series of profitable exchanges for your people.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_STARBASE_DESC
StringTable.String: Our people have built permanent structures in space before, but nothing like this. This starbase is an extension of our very civilization. Everything we do, everything we are, can be found here. From it, we will surely extend our civilization even further.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_ANOMALY_DESC
StringTable.String: Our survey ship cautiously approaches the mysterious object, all sensors set to maximal gain. One of the universe's many secrets, perhaps a great danger or valuable treasure, will soon be revealed to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_SUBSPACE_STREAM_TRAVEL_DESC
StringTable.String: With a flash and a trick of physics, the ship is gone, having traveled farther and faster than any of our kind has traveled before. Today, the galaxy has gotten much, much smaller.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_INVASION_DESC
StringTable.String: Not every planet we find will be empty; we've known that for some time. But today is the first day we've tried to take one from someone else. Today will mark a victory we will surely celebrate for a long time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_GOVERNMENT_UPGRADE_DESC
StringTable.String: Our people have spoken, and although some might doubt the wisdom, none shall doubt the process. Our new government has been given a clear mandate. Let's wish them the best, for their failure will become ours.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_PRECURSOR_RELIC_DESC
StringTable.String: The scanner readings are inconclusive, but one thing is for certain: this object is old. As our probes maneuver around the strange device, it becomes clear that the beings who made this were vastly more powerful and experienced than we are. It's a privilege to even gaze upon their work.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_TERROR_STAR_USED_DESC
StringTable.String: Our civilization has unleashed the devastating power of a Terror Star, wiping out an entire system and all the life it hosted. There's no turning back; the Age of Terror has begun.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_TERROR_STAR_BUILT_DESC
StringTable.String: Your newly constructed space station is the ultimate in warfare weaponry. Equipped with a system-destroying Death Beam, your enemies will have to do some tricky maneuvering to take out this behemoth (just keep an eye on that thermal exhaust port).

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Altarian_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of defensive and economic boosting ships best used to guard your worlds.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Baratak_Dec
StringTable.String: A wide range of ships crafted to help spread your civilization into the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Drath_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of warships equipped to attack from a distance.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Drengin_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of formidable warships designed to win battles.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Festron_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to collect what they can from battles.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Iconian_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed with strong military bonuses when they are within their borders.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Iridium_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships designed to keep your coffers full.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Krynn_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of ships that boost the Influence of worlds they are by.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Manti_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of ships which are all able to survey anomalies.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Mimot_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of ships that are able to produce more ships.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Navigators_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of ships designed to generate Research for your civilization.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Onyx_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of warships that are able to repair their entire fleet with Promethion.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Resistance_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of warships that receive double the normal amount of experience and additional bonuses as they level up.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Terran_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong selection of warships balanced between Kinetic, Missile, and Beam attacks.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Torian_Dec
StringTable.String: A group of ships designed to explore the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Xeloxi_Dec
StringTable.String: A group of warships that spread Crime to any neutral or enemy worlds within range.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Yor_Dec
StringTable.String: A group of warships that all give bonuses to their entire fleet, and become deadly when they are all fleeted up together.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Crystalline_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of warships that increase Control with every battle won.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Seeing_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships with anomaly research capabilities and large sensor ranges.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Irradiated_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of ships that have been fused with space monsters.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipSet_Moth_Dec
StringTable.String: A selection of versatile ships designed to protect and spread [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SEEING_Dec
StringTable.String: The Intueri are a hive mind without any meaningful capability of complex thought. They can comprehend and imitate anything they see but are very slow to develop scientific breakthroughs independently.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SEEING_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Intueri develop as quickly as those they watch. They can easily comprehend and replicate things they witness; however, their lack of creative thought and ability to problem solve impacts their ability to make their own discoveries.[BR][BR]The collective consciousness of the Intueri had been stagnant for nearly a millennia until they made contact with the Luxar. After first gazing upon their star ships and faster-than-light drives, the Intueri quickly took to the stars. Now they search far and wide for the knowledge of others to expand their own intelligence.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SEEING_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Intueri's have high exploration and sensor range, enabling them to quickly map out the galaxy. To compensate for their low Research rate the Intueri have the Cosmic Eye, a powerful tool that allows them to steal technology and research from other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Sandbox_Desc
StringTable.String: Standard Galactic Civilizations 4 rules. Allows human players and AI players to form teams.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Arena_Desc
StringTable.String: No AI players. All players are permanently at war with each other.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Agenda_Desc
StringTable.String: An objective is randomly assigned to all human players. The first to complete it wins the game.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_HiddenAgenda_Desc
StringTable.String: Players are randomly assigned an objective that must be met to win the game. Only you know what your agenda is.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Survival_Desc
StringTable.String: Humans are permanently at war with the AI players. AI players gain bonuses over time and can not be defeated. The winner is the player that survives the longest.

StringTable.Label: ColonialGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String: Colonial Government[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Colonial governments are the base government for starfaring civilizations. They don't apply any specific bonuses or penalties.[BR][BR]To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ImperialGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String: Imperial Government[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Imperial governments are the first step in building an efficient government for a galactic empire.[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Policy Slot[BR]+10% Manufacturing[BR]+25% Ship Range[BR]+3 Expectations for all Citizens[BR][BR]To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RepublicGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String: Republic Government[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Republic governments improve efficiency by making use of local resources for maintenance and logistics.[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Policy Slots[BR]+20% Manufacturing[BR]+20% Income[BR]+10 Logistics[BR]+50% Ship Range[BR]+6 Expectations for all Citizens[BR][BR]To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FederationGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String: Federation Government[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Republic governments improve efficiency by making use of local resources for maintenance and logistics.[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Policy Slots[BR]+30% Manufacturing[BR]+30% Income[BR]+30% Influence[BR]+20 Logistics[BR]+100% Ship Range[BR]+9 Expectations for all Citizens[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AIManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: AIResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Research

StringTable.Label: AIWealth_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Wealth

StringTable.Label: BalancedGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet to be well balanced.

StringTable.Label: ManufacturingGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: ResearchGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Research

StringTable.Label: WealthGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: Builds out planet with focus on Wealth

StringTable.Label: Event_HegemonySpawn_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Word has reached us that a new empire called The Hegemony has arrived in our part of space.[BR][BR]Allegedly they only want total domination of the galaxy. They do not want peace. They will not accept surrender. They wish to wipe everyone out. We must be on guard for them.

StringTable.Label: Event_HegemonySpawn_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: We will keep an eye out for this new civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlyneSpawn_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Word has reached us that the gelatinous species known as the Slyne have returned to our area of space.[BR][BR]Something has changed in them. It was well known that they experimented with cybernetic implants to enhance themselves but now they appear mad.[BR][BR]Reports indicate that they are on a rampage across the galaxy. They must be stopped!

StringTable.Label: Event_SlyneSpawn_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: We will keep an eye out for them.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnXendar_Dec
StringTable.String: Galactic archives tell tales of the Xendar, a mighty civilization whose luminescence was extinguished by humans during the early years of exploration. The stars bore silent witness to their apparent end. But nothing in space remains hidden forever.[BR][BR]A force, pulsing with malice, has emerged from the void. The Xendar have returned, not as the pawns they once were, but as avatars of vengeance.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnXendar_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: We will not go quietly into the night.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnThalan_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace communication has brought us knowledge that confirms our worst fears: Time travel is possible, and the users of it mean to expunge us from the timeline![BR][BR]The Thalan, a civilization from an alternative, crumbling future, have arrived. In their timeline, the actions of our present civilizations lead to a future calamity that engulfs all. Now, they've embarked on a desperate mission: to save their own people, even if it means erasing us from existence.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnThalan_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: We will not be erased. Probably.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnSnathi_Dec_7XT
StringTable.String: Intergalactic channels are abuzz with disconcerting rumors. Hailing from the hidden reaches of the cosmos, the Snathi, cosmic squirrels with a lust for domination, have made their ominous presence known.[BR][BR]Once thought to be mere space legends, whispered in hushed tones, these squirrels aren't here to hoard nuts. They've harnessed the energy of the stars, equipped their ships with weapons of unparalleled fury, and are now plotting their rapid expansion.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpawnSnathi_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: We must prepare for the squirrelly onslaught.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SYLNE_Dec
StringTable.String: The Sylne Federation, an ancient and secretive civilization, prides itself on its scientific advancements and the ability to withstand wars against all odds. Originating from the SlyneSystem, they are known for their neutral stance and expansionist motives.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SYLNE_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: Lord Aelron, a visionary leader of the Sylne Federation, is known for his strategic brilliance and his unwavering commitment to the progress of his people. He believes in a harmonious universe where science and peace coexist.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SYLNE_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Sylne Federation is a highly advanced civilization with a deep understanding of the universe. Their mastery over science and technology makes them a formidable foe to all who cross their path.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SYLNE_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Sylne Federation, an ancient and secretive civilization, prides itself on its scientific advancements and the ability to withstand wars against all odds. Originating from the SlyneSystem, they are known for their neutral stance and expansionist motives.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_THALAN_Dec
StringTable.String: The Thalan Contingency, hailing from the distant ThalisSystem, are a unique blend of ancient knowledge and advanced time manipulation techniques. While their intentions are largely peaceful, their xenophobic tendencies keep them cautious of other civilizations. Their incredible mastery over time and deep understanding of the universe make them a formidable force.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_THALAN_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: High Councillor Thelis, a timeless figure of the Thalan Contingency, embodies wisdom and foresight. His leadership focuses on safeguarding Thalan traditions while adapting to the ever-evolving galactic stage. His vast knowledge has steered the Thalan through countless adversities.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_THALAN_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Thalan Contingency is a highly advanced civilization with a deep understanding of the universe. Their mastery over time and space makes them a formidable foe to all who cross their path.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_THALAN_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Thalan Contingency, hailing from the distant ThalisSystem, are a unique blend of ancient knowledge and advanced time manipulation techniques. While their intentions are largely peaceful, their xenophobic tendencies keep them cautious of other civilizations. Their incredible mastery over time and deep understanding of the universe make them a formidable force.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SNATHI_Dec
StringTable.String: Unleashed from their prison by the Dread Lords, the Snathi have returned with a burning vendetta. These aggressive space squirrels were once bio-engineered by the Precursors to be caretakers but turned into their most feared adversaries. The Snathi, now with their newfound freedom, will let no one stand in their way as they conquer the stars.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SNATHI_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: Overlord Squeek, the most fearsome and cunning of the Snathi, is a master tactician who seeks to bring the universe under his rule. With a sharp mind and an even sharper claw, Squeek will stop at nothing to exact revenge on those who dared to imprison his kind.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SNATHI_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The universe once trembled at the very mention of the Snathi. With their newfound freedom, they are determined to reclaim their place in the cosmos, leaving devastation in their wake.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_SNATHI_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Scavengers of ancient relics and zealous in their cause, the Snathi excel in expansion and warfare. Their resilience and toughness make them formidable opponents, and their ability to rally their kind under a single banner is unmatched.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_XENDAR_Faction_Dec
StringTable.String: The Xendar Remnants are the surviving vestiges of a once-great civilization, obliterated by the Terran Alliance. Now, driven by vengeance and a thirst for power, they aim to retake the galaxy, ensuring that the Xendar name once more reigns supreme. Their past has taught them that only through strength and unity can they prevent future annihilation.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_XENDAR_Faction_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: Lord Vrexar is a beacon of hope and vengeance for his people. A survivor of the Terran-Xendar war, his leadership is defined by his unwavering commitment to the Xendar's resurgence and his deep-seated resentment towards the Terran Alliance.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_XENDAR_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: While they may be remnants of a bygone era, the Xendar are masterful engineers, expert colonizers, and fierce warriors. Their aggressive and xenophobic tendencies, born from a history of betrayal, make them a formidable foe to all who cross their path.

StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The smallest minority is the individual. You cannot deny the individual and claim to defend minorities.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+8% Approval on all Core Worlds except your Homeworld and a free Leader[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_MobilityRights_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our thrifty starbase engineers are so efficient that they can now reach resources and planets further out in space.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Starbase Range[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FreeTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]With the proper infrastructure in place, we will be far better able to capitalize on the possibilities of interstellar travel.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants a free Freighter and a Trader citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Deregulation_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]When any outside force exerts control on the market it will always be to its own advantage, and to the detriment of the market itself.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Global Income[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PrivateOwnership_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We are so proficient at building Starbases that they can now maintain themselves with the resources found around them in space.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Starbases no longer pay Maintenance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_OpenCommunication_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]With no barriers to sharing knowledge and opinions, positive discourse spreads throughout the cosmos.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Increase influence generation by 50% on all planets.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_IronFist_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]When you whip a worker, it inspires immense productivity in him, and any that witness the event.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+100 Control[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prestige_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The famous will show you what a culture values. While others worship the vapid and beautiful or the bright and curious, we revere the strong.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Double Ship Experience[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Service_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Military service ensures the survival and prosperity of the collective through the relentless pursuit of order and unity.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Soldiers Generate Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SecretPolice_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]With our empire now stretching across the stars, there are many dark corners we can disappear troublemakers to.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the Secret Police policy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Intimidating_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Dealing with the authoritarian galactic empire is like bargaining with a black hole, where one wrong move could lead to your ultimate demise.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Intimidation increases the perceived value of goods by 15% instead of 5%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Conscription_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Conscription is deemed an essential and inescapable duty for all citizens.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants five free Transports[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Discipline_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]By cultivating a culture of discipline, efficiency, and continuous improvement, we can accelerate the pace of manufacturing progress.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Rushing is not limited[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Ambition_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]You can take the life of a slave. But richly reward a man and he will give his life freely.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Leaders cost less to hire[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Recruiting_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Where there is no vision, the people perish.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reduced cooldown to use the Recruit Leaders executive order[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Incentives_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Even the charitable enjoy nice things.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Loyalty for Leaders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CelebrateTalent_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Equality drags the least valuable forward while holding the most exceptional back. We should celebrate our leaders, not restrain them.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval boost after recruiting a Leader[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Merit_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In your society, positions of power and influence are earned, not given. Achievement and talent are recognized and rewarded above all.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Leaders are more cost-efficient to hire, reflecting the meritocratic principles of your civilization.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Poaching_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Why serve a fallen empire when you can be a conqueror?[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]When you capture a Core World you keep the Governor[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Fairness_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Fairness fosters unity among diverse populations, providing a strong foundation for sustainable empire building.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]10% Approval boost on all worlds[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 free Colony ships[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Representation_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We measure success not by personal achievement, but by the growth and happiness of our neighbors.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All Colonies generate Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Inclusivity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]An inclusive empire combines advanced technology, diverse cultures, and equal opportunities, creating an enticing haven for outsiders.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Worlds with over 50% Approval get +15% Influence.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedPurpose_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Let every idea be presented, and succeed or fail based on its merit. There is no room for morality in science, only rationality.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Resolve[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Empowerment_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Empowerment instills a sense of responsibility in our citizens, driving them to be more proactive in contributing to the betterment of society.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+ 2 global citizen Diligence and 5 free leaders.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Diversity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Diversity fuels innovation, fosters resilience, and ultimately strengthens the foundation and growth of an empire.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens now increase core world influence by 1% per social skill.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_History_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the improvement "Hall Of Tradition".[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SocialTies_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]A community with strong social bonds prioritizes harmony, respect, and the collective well-being of all.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Our citizens no longer generate crime.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CodeOfLaw_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In the time-honored traditions of justice, ancient and steadfast, all find solace in the assurance of fair and consistent treatment under the unwavering law.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Add an additional Policy slot[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FamilyValues_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our Starbases glitter in the deep night of space like stars formed from glass and titanium.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Population growth rates increase by 25%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CulturalPride_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Cultural pride is a powerful force that can inspire individuals and communities to overcome adversity, preserve their heritage, and assert their rightful place in the galaxy.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Every citizen with the Traditional trait produces +1 raw wealth per turn for their core world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Devotion_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Iron can bind a man, devotion can bind a generation.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Every citizen with the traditional trait produces +1 raw minerals per turn for their core world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Dogma_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our people are so proud that the concept of yielding to a foreign culture is hard to imagine.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All planets gain +25% Resistance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Eureka_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Abandon the fear of change and embrace discovery.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval boost after discovering a new Technology and +30 Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_DeepInvestigation_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]There are lessons to be learned from even the most meager sources.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Research after surveying an Anomaly[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Uncovers many new anomalies near our homeworld[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_EarlyAdoption_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The early adoption of technology in a rapidly evolving universe is like riding a cosmic wave, where those who dare to surf the unknown may unlock the secrets of the stars.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Breakthrough tech discount increases to 60%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Breakthrough_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Science unconstrained can change everything, for good or bad.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+100 Research, unlocks Hyperion Shrinker Galactic Achievement[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_RiskTaking_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The progress of logic requires an uncompromising assault on dogma and rhetoric.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the Shark Tank improvement.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Futurist_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Do not celebrate doctors, soldiers, or entrepreneurs. Where would they be without the inventions that led to their craft?[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks The Possibility Engine planetary improvement[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_QuantumLeap_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Let every idea be presented and succeed or fail based on its merit. There is no room for morality in science, only rationality.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1000 Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Kindness_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, we cannot survive.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval bonus based on Compassion +1 Diplomacy[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 Constructor ships join you[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Charity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In the vast expanse of the cosmos, generosity has never led a soul to impoverishment.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10% Global Crime. Spawns support ship "Goodwill".[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Sustainability_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our relationship with nature is not one of exploitation, but of symbiosis, nurturing the delicate balance that sustains life for eons to come.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10% Global Pollution[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Altruism_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]When you do not treat the empire building game as zero sum, you can build a galactic community everyone benefits from.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Diplomacy[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Empathy_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In the midst of war, empathy becomes a beacon of hope, reminding us of our shared harmony and the potential for peace and understanding.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens no longer negatively react to being at war with their home civilizations.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Forgiveness_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Acknowledging and forgiving the mistakes of all alien species unlocks the door to shared progress.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ignores diplomatic penalties for being at war with allies or trading with enemies.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Consensus_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We unanimously agree that the shared joy of collective prosperity outweighs the fleeting thrill of individual triumph.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizen Expectations reduced by 50% and Citizen's with the Collectivist trait gain +10% approval.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Practicality_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Of all the things that an empire must have, is there anything more important than sound logistics?[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawns 3 supply ships.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Realism_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We are known for valuing goods at their objective worth.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Alien Civs will value your trades by 50% more.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_GoalOriented_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our leadership maximizes the resources at hand, focusing on achieving desired outcomes, and continuously striving for improvement and success.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Governor core world bonus is doubled.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Flexibility_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Flexibility allows for adaptation to market fluctuations, fostering mutually beneficial exchanges and promoting economic growth.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Galactic Bazaar sell price +25%, Galactic Bazaar buy price -25%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Attrition_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]By opening ourselves up to the universe, it embraces us as well. It also rejects those that stand against us.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Hit Points for enemy ships in our borders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Resilience_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]With each victory, our forces become more sure of their cause and more determined to do what is needed to achieve it.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1% Approval per conquered planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Amiable_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our reasonable approach has established a reputation that will benefit us in all our diplomatic dealings.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Diplomacy[BR]Improved Trade Values[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Negotiators_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In negotiation, we do not seek mere personal gain; we forge bridges for mutual prosperity and harmony.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Diplomatic Capital per month[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Responsibility_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Responsibility in low-level leaders cultivates efficient resource management, reducing maintenance costs as government funds are utilized wisely, minimizing waste and loss.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% civilization wide maintenance reduction [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Trustworthy_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Trustworthiness is not merely a personal virtue; it is the cornerstone of lasting connections and the backbone of a cohesive community.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Social[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Honesty_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Honesty, the noblest virtue in a leader, shines like a beacon of trust, endearing them to their people and inspiring loyalty through the ages.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All Leaders gain Transparent trait.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Reliable_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our word is more trusted in the universe than any contract.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Other races will trade more favorably with us[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Spycraft_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]What is real is irrelevant, only what people believe to be real.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Deception[BR]All leaders have the Advocate trait[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Detached_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our society has grown so Detached from consumerism that there is plenty of excess goods.[/I][BR][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 free supply ships and +10% income on all worlds.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CriminalTies_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We have traded and traveled with the darker elements of the galaxy for so long that they see us as one of them.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks Crime Wave executive order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Discretion_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our people make sure that hostile races have a hard time getting around our territories.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Enemy ships in our borders are -1 to Sensor Range and Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Paranoia_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In the shadowy expanse of the galaxy, paranoia is a sinister ally.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All of our Leaders are Paranoid[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CrimeLords_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In this unforgiving galaxy, it is the cunning and ruthless who thrive.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants 3 new Leaders and +3% Global Crime[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_HiddenAgenda_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]We have established a reputation that we can be reasoned with, and we can talk our way out of all conflicts.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]No one will declare war on us for the next 50 turns[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Independence_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Independence in colonies nurtures self-reliance, empowering them to tend to their own needs and flourish autonomously.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-15% Decay from colonies[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawns the ship "The Independence"[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Inviting_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]An inviting culture serves as a beacon of warmth and unity, drawing together diverse beings and fostering a sense of belonging.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Citizens of random species[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Adaptable_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our expertise in exploration and colonization has paid off again, by allowing us to find additional usable tiles on each of our colonies.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Gain 2 additional tiles on every Planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfDeterminism_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our society gives individuals the opportunity to decide their own future, for better or worse.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 Leaders join us. +3 to all stats of citizens with individualist trait.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfSufficiency_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In the ever changing tides of war and exploration, the ability to look after yourself is paramount.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All ships gain increased repair speed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Enticing_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Our reputation has grown to the point that any world within our Influence begs to join our Civilization.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All planets and Starbases within our Influence join our civilization[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Unification_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Unification weaves together the threads of diverse civilizations, elevating all who embrace its unity to new heights of wisdom and prosperity.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+100% Homeworld Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedBelief_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Shared beliefs and values unite the hearts and minds of countless beings, the strength of their collective spirit transcends the limits of individual understanding.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All planets gain +15% Resistance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PreferredCulture_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]United under a preferred culture, diverse societies soar to new heights of progress and enlightenment.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Approval for our civilization species.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Respect_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Respect, the cornerstone of true leadership, fosters unwavering loyalty.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 leader loyalty bonus[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Peacekeeping_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]With kind words, a wise leader pacifies their enemies, disarming their hostility and transforming adversaries into allies, forging a harmonious path to lasting peace.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All leaders gain the peacemaker trait. Starbase range +1.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Serenity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The culture and standard of living of our civilization is admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens with the Pacifist Trait have their stats quadrupled.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Intolerance_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Intolerance fuels desire for conflict without concern for the identity of one's adversaries.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens no longer negatively react to being at war with their own species.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prejudice_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Prejudice and discrimination against inferior races is essential for maintaining supremacy and domination over the weaker species in the galaxy.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens that are not our species gain +2 Dilligence. [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Censorship_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The power of censorship lies in its sinister ability to manipulate minds, suppress dissent, and control the narrative.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Factions have no negative side effects[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Oppression_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The value of oppression lies in its malevolent capacity to subjugate and control the masses.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Faction benefits increased by 50%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Planning_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]A culture built on organization and strategic planning gives rise to formidable fleets.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+8 Logistics[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Exploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]It is our duty to harness the labor and resources of weaker species, for their worth is only in serving us.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks Exploit Population executive order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_AbuseOfPower_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Power is undiluted when wielded with absolute authority.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Double the # of control per month[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Tolerance_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]True progress in any society can only be achieved through the practice of tolerance and acceptance towards those who are different from ourselves.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Core worlds start with +100 Influence and an additional +5 Influence Per Turn[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Integrity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]When individuals and institutions choose to prioritize integrity and honesty over personal gain, the prevalence of crime and corruption in society will naturally decrease.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All crime reduced by 50%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Peacefulness_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]It is the steadfast commitment to peace that brings hope to the civilizations who cherish its values.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the United Planets improvement[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_UniversalRights_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Universal rights and freedoms for all beings are essential for fostering a stable, prosperous, and harmonious society.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Every citizen with the Egalitarian trait provides 1 raw cultural input per turn.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Environmentalism_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Preserving and protecting the environment is not only essential for the survival of our planet, but also for the well-being and prosperity of all the diverse life forms that call it home.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-50% Pollution on all worlds[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_GalacticCourt_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The galactic court reigns supreme, dispensing justice with impartiality and compassion, a beacon of hope to all who seek fairness in a universe of chaos.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the Galactic Court improvement[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfReliance_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The triumph of the individual over the circumstances is the essence of self-reliance. Your people value independence and personal responsibility.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizens get +3 to their attributes.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Autonomy_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The choice belongs to the individual. Your society believes in the personal freedom to make decisions.[/I][BR][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Governors get +10 loyalty, +1 Policy Slots.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PrivatePropertyRights_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Ownership is respected and protected. Your society values the individual rights to accumulate and control property.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks the Entrepreneur specialization and +1 Orbital Upgrade slot to every planet.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Competitiveness_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Society rewards those who strive to be the best. Your people value competition and the pursuit of excellence.[/I][BR][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All citizens who have the individualist Trait now provide +1 raw wealth to their core world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Privacy_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Individuals' right to privacy is highly valued and protected. Your society respects personal space, data, and communications.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All citizens who have the Individualist Trait get a 25% approval bonus.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Obedience_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In your society, unity and order are valued above all. Obedience to the state's command is a virtue, not a burden.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Citizen expectations lowered by 20%. Citizens with the Totalitarianism trait provide +25% more maxmanufacturing. Spawns support ship "The Enforcer".[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Propaganda_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Your state exercises control over information, skillfully shaping public opinion to align with its interests.[/I][BR][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Influence on all Core Worlds and increased population growth due to effective state messaging.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Purges_Dec
