StringTable.String: Believes in the primacy of individual rights, personal freedom, and self-reliance, often over the needs and interests of the community or society.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Progressivism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the relentless pursuit of technological advancement and societal reform, often with a focus on universal equality across species and planetary systems.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Collectivism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in prioritizing the group, community, or society over individual interests, often with a focus on shared responsibility and collective action.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Traditionalism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the importance of preserving established customs, practices, and institutions and views societal change with caution.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Nihilism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the rejection or denial of inherent meaning or value in life. Causing pain in others is the reward.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Criminal_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] on this planet, but at least they don't complain about the crime rate as much.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Convict_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen has been imprisoned and released.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Opportunity_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen believes that individuals should be rewarded based on their effort and success.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Infected_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a sentient pod growing out of this this citizens skull.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Trauma_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen has survived a horrific event, barely.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Mutant_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen suffers from disgusting mutations, none of which provided superpowers.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Emporium_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen believes in intergalactic trade.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_NaturalLeague_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen hates cybernetics and synthetic life.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Pacifist_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen hates war and is comforted during times of peace.[BR]-1% Resistance and Soldiering

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Warforged_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen believes war will strengthen us.[BR]+1% Resistance and Soldiering

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_SyntheticLife_Dec
StringTable.String: Life comes in many forms. Not all require bone, flesh and blood.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_TheWay_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynn religion teaches that tithing to the government is an important part of worship.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_NeuralClamp_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizens mood is being controlled to keep away pesky thoughts like anger and violence.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Liberty_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in a society where individuals are free to pursue their own paths unencumbered by oppressive control.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Protesting_Dec
StringTable.String: Enough is enough. (I am no longer providing my bonuses)

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Advocate_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, improves the public image of your civilization. This makes their worlds more likely to culture flip to your control.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Embezzler_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat they are deeply involved in the finances of the civilization they are assigned to, and fluid morals allows them to occasionally divert some our way.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Investigator_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, keeps a close eye on the Research of the civilization they are assigned to, and may occasionally steal technologies.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Negotiator_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, increases the value of our goods for deals with their assigned civilization.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Peacemaker_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, makes their assigned civilization less likely to declare war on you.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Smuggler_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, increases the [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] of the civilization they are assigned to.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Spy_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat, reveals the destinations of their assigned civilizations fleets.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Supportive_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat boosts the [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] of the civilization they are assigned to by 5%.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Toxic_Dec
StringTable.String: A Toxic diplomat reduces the [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] of the civilization they are assigned to by 5%.

StringTable.Label: DiplomatTrait_Underminer_Dec
StringTable.String: As a diplomat reduces the [HS=HS_Resistance]Resistance[/HS] of the civilization they are assigned to by 10%.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Enviromentalist_Dec
StringTable.String: -10% Pollution when assigned as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Prescient_Dec
StringTable.String: +10% [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and -20% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] when assigned as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Faithful_Dec
StringTable.String: +3% Approval[BR]+10 Loyalty[BR]-10% Research when assigned as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Industrial_Dec
StringTable.String: +10% [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] and [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] when assigned as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Kind_Dec
StringTable.String: +5 Social and can't Quell Protests as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Opportunist_Dec
StringTable.String: When assigned as a Governor, if their planet is conquered they join the new owner.[BR]-10 Loyalty.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Paranoid_Dec
StringTable.String: When assigned as a Governor, will flee back to your leader pool if their planet is conquered.

StringTable.Label: GovernorTrait_Slumlord_Dec
StringTable.String: +3 Population Capacity and -6% Approval when assigned as a Governor.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Warforged_Dec
StringTable.String: Double experience when assigned as a Commander.

StringTable.Label: UnitTrait_Cybernetic_Dec
StringTable.String: Cybernetic enhancement is hated by a portion of our population.

StringTable.Label: UnitTrait_Genius_Dec
StringTable.String: Completes current technological research when recruited.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Consuming_Dec
StringTable.String: Festron lay eggs in other species. When those eggs hatch the other citizen is killed, and a new Festron citizen is born.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ArrangedMarriage_Dec
StringTable.String: Frequently defies local customs and traditions.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Brooch_Dec
StringTable.String: Is admired for the alien artifact they possess.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Telepathic_Dec
StringTable.String: Telepathic citizens exhibit incredible talent. They have increased stats and their presence reduces [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] on their world.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Evolving_1_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen will evolve to another race over time.

StringTable.Label: CitizenTrait_Evolving_2_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen will evolve to another race over time.

StringTable.Label: UnitTrait_Telepathic_Altarian_Dec
StringTable.String: -10% Crime when assigned as a Governor[BR]+10 Control.

StringTable.Label: UnitTrait_Telepathic_Crystalline_Dec
StringTable.String: -10% Crime when assigned as a Governor[BR]+10 Control

StringTable.Label: UnitTrait_Telepathic_Seeing_Dec
StringTable.String: -10% Crime when assigned as a Governor[BR]+10 Control

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_RaisedBySquatters_Dec
StringTable.String: Raised by squatters in a destitute factory.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_TrainedChef_Dec
StringTable.String: Trained as a chef and dreams of opening a restaurant.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Claustrophobia_Dec
StringTable.String: Suffers from claustrophobia, hates being in spaceships.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PartyLoyalist_Dec
StringTable.String: Has no friends or family outside of their political party.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FailedMedSchool_Desc
StringTable.String: Failed out of medical school and doesn't like talking about it.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AvoidedService_Dec
StringTable.String: Avoided military service due to family connections.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ExcludedInheritance_Dec
StringTable.String: Excluded from a family inheritance and terribly bitter about it.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ScarredDuelist_Desc
StringTable.String: Scarred in a duel with a romantic rival. They won though.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NoSenseOfSmell_Dec
StringTable.String: Lost their sense of smell in an industrial accident.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_TibetanMonastery_Desc
StringTable.String: Spent their youth in a Tibetan monastery.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_WharfRat_Desc
StringTable.String: A former wharf rat, escaped from the slums of a port city.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MilitaryChild_Desc
StringTable.String: Grew up in a military family, constantly moving around the solar system.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FormerSailor_Desc
StringTable.String: A former sailor, used to spending months alone at sea.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_CareerDiplomat_Desc
StringTable.String: A career diplomat who loves understanding all the details.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FrostbittenToes_Desc
StringTable.String: Lost two toes from frostbite in a mountaineering accident.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DetailOrientedEngineer_Dec
StringTable.String: A former engineer, easily distracted by minute details.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_BadlyBurnt_Dec
StringTable.String: Badly burnt in a cooking accident as a child.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DeceasedFriend_Dec
StringTable.String: Grooms themselves to look identical to a long dead friend from their childhood.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AlienCoinFlipper_Desc
StringTable.String: Constantly flipping a coin of alien origin.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_GrammarEnforcer_Desc
StringTable.String: Has been known to violently enforce the use of proper grammar.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FormerGladiator_Dec
StringTable.String: A former gladiator who earned their freedom through countless battles.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PsychicBond_Dec
StringTable.String: Has a psychic bond with a dangerous alien.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SpaceExplorer_Desc
StringTable.String: A renowned space explorer who disappeared for years, only to reappear with no memory of what happened.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SurvivedMutiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Survived a spaceship mutiny and lived to tell the tale.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AncientAlienLibrary_Dec
StringTable.String: Discovered an ancient alien library and learned its forbidden knowledge.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ReincarnatedHero_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes they are the reincarnation of a legendary hero.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AncientCultist_Dec
StringTable.String: Once belonged to a cult that worshipped a long-dead alien god.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_TimeTraveler_Dec
StringTable.String: Claims to have come from a dystopian future and is trying to prevent it from happening.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AsteroidMiner_Dec
StringTable.String: Became rich after finding a rare mineral deposit on a desolate asteroid.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_RenownedArchaeologist_Dec
StringTable.String: A renowned archaeologist who seeks to unearth the mysteries of ancient civilizations.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MissingTwin_Dec
StringTable.String: Had an identical twin that went missing years ago.

StringTable.Label: FleetDeathDesc
StringTable.String: {OBJECTNAME} was destroyed here. Click to replay the battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, mankind has dreamed of setting foot on other worlds. That dream is now a reality. Feet are being set on other worlds. In fact, we're setting lots of things on other worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Planetology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to improve our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Planetology_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting agreement on a unified food production plan is non-trivial. We are pleased to report that we can now define vast areas of a planet's surface to be used for the growing of food.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResearchDistricts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to improve Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResearchDistricts_Dec
StringTable.String: With the understanding that we must organize ourselves more effectively in order to be more inventive, we have agreed to allow vast areas of the planet's surface to focus on researching new technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceElevators_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to quickly move resources into orbit and begin constructing Supply Ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceElevators_Dec
StringTable.String: The challenge of moving our manufactured products into orbit has been with us for many years. Space Elevators provide a cheap and reliable way to move things from the ground into space.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoIndustrialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Back during the age of Nation States, we learned how to set up international supply chains. Now, in this new age, we must prepare ourselves for galactic supply chains. Our best thinkers have produced a series of strategies to replace "Just in time" with a new motto "Just a galactic minute!"

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: All of our manufacturing processes will need to be adjusted to suit different planetary environments. The gravity's different, the water's different, the background radiation is different. Until we do this, our manufacturing output will be sorely limited.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FusionPowerPlants_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FusionPowerPlants_Dec
StringTable.String: Fusion has proven to be a remarkably difficult technology to master, having stayed just out of reach of our scientists for decades now. But this time we've finally done it, and our manufacturing will benefit greatly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to construct orbital mines for our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Having mastered the basics of manufacturing in alien environments, we can now increase the capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Bioplastics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Bioplastics_Dec
StringTable.String: The efficient rearrangement of organic molecules into useful building materials will enable us to build faster and cheaper than before, using less of our more precious resources in the process.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ManufacturingCapitals_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ManufacturingCapitals_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to tackle some of the more persistent inefficiencies present in our manufacturing sector, we've concluded that a degree of centralization is in order. Dedicated manufacturing capitals should lead to important multiplicative effects in our manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResourceMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResourceMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Rock is never just rock - the subsurface layers of alien worlds have nearly as much variation as the lifeforms which roam their surfaces. We'll need to master these different subterranean conditions if we can hope to extract even a fraction of the resources available to us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMatterPowerPlants_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMatterPowerPlants_Dec
StringTable.String: Antimatter, while still exotic, is not as impossibly rare as we once thought. With careful handling - heavy emphasis on the careful - we should be able to create impressively potent power generation facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Claytronics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Claytronics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our material engineers have devised a new form of augmented mineral with unique mechanical and electrical properties. Its malleability can be altered and controlled on the fly, allowing for truly remarkable and cost effective machines and resultant manufacturing processes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Mining raw ore is only one part of the resource generation process. Extracting valuable materials from that ore is an extraordinarily involved process, made orders of magnitude harder by the sheer variety of contaminants we find in alien ores.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SingularityPowerPlants_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the production of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SingularityPowerPlants_Dec
StringTable.String: On the edge of a singularity, matter is converted to energy with perfect efficiency. But unlike our earlier antimatter power plants, generators using this principle are far easier to scale safely. And we can use nearly anything for fuel.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to start training a new generation of scientists.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Having sent many of our best minds to live on our new colonies, we should now put them to work, studying the worlds and space around them. But to do that, they'll need facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumComputing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows access to powerful, but expensive, super computers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumComputing_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum computing won't lead to the nearly magical benefits some think, but it should still make it possible for our researchers to approach entirely new classes of mathematical problems with new confidence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ComputingSubstrates_Dec
StringTable.String: To date, most of our quantum computing systems have been little more than prototypes, requiring a great deal of care and operator intervention to use. Our latest developments will allow for denser, more deeply layered computing substrates, which will not only be more effective but also more maintainable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalResearchLabs_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain types of research - particularly in material science and high energy fields - can only be done in microgravity environments. Dedicated facilities for this work in orbit should speed up the progress of our research efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NeuralMapping_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long used computers to assist with our research, but this latest breakthrough will allow the computers to make deductive leaps themselves. At scale, this should still lead to a dramatic increase in the number of true breakthroughs we find.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResearchMatrix_Dec
StringTable.String: By arranging neural-mapping circuitry in n-dimensional cubes, and assigning each dimension to individual research domains, we can increase the odds of finding cross-domain connections, and exploiting the associated breakthroughs that are sure to follow.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificalBrains_Dec
StringTable.String: Rather than brute-forcing our attempts at research, the Artificial Brain project will use a new form of introspective research matrix to specifically target regions where knowledge is most likely to be uncovered.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PostSentience_Dec
StringTable.String: For our entire history, we have considered computers a tool, something that we exploit. That simple thinking has become unbalanced however, and our relationship with these powerful devices is changing. We are fortunate that they seem to want the same things we do: knowledge.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AIOverseer_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it was due to constraints established by our own wisdom, or some hidden system of morality they possess, our AI systems thankfully view us benevolently. But in the field of research at least, it is their direction we follow, not the other way around. And they are never, ever wrong.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TechnologicalSingularity_Dec
StringTable.String: The pace of technological developments has increased to the point we can no longer predict what we will discover next. The curve of knowledge-time is bending towards infinity. A generation or two ago, this concept would have sounded terrifying, but now we can see how glorious it will be.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the downsides of living on habitable planets is that other creatures think they're habitable too. We will have to coexist with the native lifeforms on our new worlds, and we'll need some practice to figure out the best ways of doing that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoConservation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoConservation_Dec
StringTable.String: Having studied alien biology for some time now, we can confidently predict the effects our presence will have on it. The effects aren't good. We should labor to protect the environments in which we find ourselves, so that they will continue to protect us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AtmosphericScrubbers_Dec
StringTable.String: There's little point in living on a world if we can't breathe its atmosphere. The latest advances in atmospheric sciences should make some of our more challenging worlds far more pleasant to live on.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LandPreservation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LandPreservation_Dec
StringTable.String: As big as the universe is, we shouldn't be wasteful with it. Usable land is still a somewhat precious commodity. A new form of land management will ensure we make the most of it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NanoRecyclers_Dec
StringTable.String: This new form of minuscule recycling robot, capable of self-repair and reproduction, will ensure we let no resources go to waste. We'll just have to be careful what they decide is worth recycling.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoAgriculture_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoAgriculture_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can't feed ourselves on the worlds we visit, there's little point in being there. The science says our crops should work. But we're going to have to adapt nearly every agricultural technique we have to do it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryAdaption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryAdaption_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the point where we no longer need to adapt our agricultural needs to meet the local environment, and can now modify the environment to meet us at least halfway.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Terraforming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to make greater use of our worlds

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Terraforming_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the point where we no longer need to adapt our agricultural needs to meet the local environment, and can now modify the environment to meet us at least halfway.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryOutposts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryOutposts_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing outposts in the less accessible corners of our new worlds, we'll be able to make better use of the land available to us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialCapitalRefit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialCapitalRefit_Dec
StringTable.String: The capitals of our colonies are makeshift by nature, built on-the-fly to meet the varying demands of a rapidly growing populace. But by a certain point, they inevitably need to be refitted to bring them up to modern standards. This project will do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Megapolis_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the number of citizens that can live on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Megapolis_Dec
StringTable.String: In the early stages of planetary colonization, it's natural for our people to spread out, to take advantage of the spaces in front of them. But by a certain point, economic and networking effects necessitate a bit more density. The megapolis is our plan for that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecureConfinement_Dec
StringTable.String: Communities have always locked away their more dangerous members. But we are finally able to effectively deter the potential criminal and rehabilitate those that have already fallen.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right twists and tweaks, we can bend the alien environments we encounter to suit our needs, instead of laboring to adjust ourselves. No longer will we be bound by their natural limits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Hydroponics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Hydroponics_Dec
StringTable.String: A regular challenge on alien worlds is finding enough clean water to grow our plants. Hydroponic techniques, when employed carefully, can grow far more food with far less water.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticAgriculture_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticAgriculture_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the alien flora we find has nutritional value we can begin exploiting, either by directly harvesting, or by grafting on to some of our more traditional crops.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SoilEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SoilEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: With the help of microscopic robots, we can engineer all sorts of features into soil, from variable moisture pockets to root-assistance pathways, all the way up to dynamic nutritional caches.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to colonize a wider variety of worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: Worlds once thought uninhabitable are now open to us, ready to be conquered by both our mastery of planetary science, and the hardiness of our colonists.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to colonize worlds that are normally inhospitable to most species.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: The brainchild of minds undeterred by nature's barriers. This technology quashes previous limitations, facilitating habitation on radiation-soaked, icy, aquatic, and generally inhospitable worlds. Harnessing advanced materials, adaptive AI, and bio-engineering marvels, it's a testament to our audacious refusal to be confined by the universe's rulebook.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FrozenWorldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to survive on Frozen Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FrozenWorldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the latest generation of cold-resistant agricultural techniques and energy conservation strategies, frozen worlds are now nearly as usable to our people as any other planet.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RadioactiveWorldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to survive on Radioactive Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RadioactiveWorldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved shielding systems, radiation resistant crops, and new forms of anti-radiation drugs have all made radioactive worlds far more... well perhaps not pleasant. We'll say more viable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AquaticWorlds_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to survive on Oceanic Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AquaticWorlds_Dec
StringTable.String: It's taken a surprising amount of engineering effort to tackle the challenge of inhabiting aquatic worlds, given the pressures involved. But we've done it, and whole new undersea horizons now lie open to the colonists who intend to settle there.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AquaticWorldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to survive on Oceanic Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AquaticWorldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It's taken a surprising amount of engineering effort to tackle the challenge of inhabiting aquatic worlds, given the pressures involved. But we've done it, and whole new undersea horizons now lie open to the colonists who intend to settle there.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptedCropEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptedCropEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the base elements our plants feed on are the same anywhere in the universe, their bioavailability in local soils and organic matter differs widely. New varieties of crops, capable of adapting to these challenges on their own, should prove a boon to our food production.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BiomassResequencers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BiomassResequencers_Dec
StringTable.String: So much alien plant life is useless for our purposes. It's almost insulting. A new field of genetic engineering called 'resequencing' promises to convert some of the more pointless flora we find into forms more useful to us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResequencerStations_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResequencerStations_Dec
StringTable.String: Were we to construct entire facilities dedicated to the resequencing process, we should be able to make worlds more habitable to us at a volume we've never seen before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to gain more benefits from Precursor relics and related technologies we encounter.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: The beings known as Precursors have littered this galaxy with ruins of one kind of another. If we can find some way to more methodically analyze these ruins, we should be able to discover far more of their makers' secrets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtifactStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enables us to exploit Precursor artifacts more effectively.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtifactStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: We routinely find devices and objects left behind by alien races. We should establish a group of researchers with the varied expertise needed to study these treasures in depth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtifactMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to use Precursor technologies on near-equal terms as the Precursors themselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtifactMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: By channeling more resources into the specialized equipment required for artifact research, we'll be able to unlock the secrets of alien artifacts faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoMedicine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows governors to construct medical centers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoMedicine_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a whole host of new types of illnesses and fertility concerns which can occur on an alien world. Our doctors and scientists are having to rediscover ways to address these issues from first principles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RegenerativeGels_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RegenerativeGels_Dec
StringTable.String: On one of the worlds we've settled, we've discovered a plant with unusual regenerative properties. Having isolated its active ingredient and made it safe for use, this breakthrough should improve the health and longevity of all our people.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GeneticArchitecture_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GeneticArchitecture_Dec
StringTable.String: A combination of DNA modification techniques and advanced computing systems has enabled us to begin customizing our very beings to better suit the environments around us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialWombs_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialWombs_Dec
StringTable.String: By making using of artificial wombs, equal or even superior to their natural counterparts, we can dramatically increase the birth-rate when we settle new worlds. No longer will our growth be limited by the number of people we start with.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Cloning_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Cloning_Dec
StringTable.String: It's taken near-simultaneous breakthroughs in medicine, computing, and ethics to reach this point, but we can now finally clone ourselves. Our population's character shouldn't be left up to genetic chance.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LifeExtension_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LifeExtension_Dec
StringTable.String: Bio-ethicists and accountants have long disagreed on the question of whether every life is worth the same. Should they ever agree, and decide who our most valuable citizens might be, we can reward those lucky few with technology to extend their lives to great lengths.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Cybernetics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Cybernetics_Dec
StringTable.String: There are some things biology just doesn't do very well. There's no shame in admitting it, and now that we know better - and can replace the faulty parts with machines - our population's health and growth rates should be more impressive than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Immortality_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered medicine to the point that there is no longer any reason why a person should die. Many will continue to do so, for personal or religious reasons. Some we will perhaps encourage in that direction. But at no point will it ever be strictly necessary.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ManufacturingStimulus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing sector sometimes finds itself at the mercy of market forces beyond its control. A small, artificial stimulus can help it weather these difficulties, or provide a boost in times of great need.

StringTable.Label: MasterMolecularFabricationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Molecular Fabrication is more than just a way to boost manufacturing: it can be used to improve everything, from more efficient weapons to more nutritious food.

StringTable.Label: MasterIndustrialReplicationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: This is the ultimate evolution of Molecular Fabrication. With Industrial Replication we can create anything we want, from anything we have.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the enhancement of our Core Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows for the enhancement of our Core Worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterCoordinationTempleTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Coordination Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterCoordinationTempleTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The coordination of labor and the spiritual health of our devoted workers can be tended to by specially trained curates Iwho have already mastered critical aspects of the Path.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TransgenicManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TransgenicManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We have advanced far beyond hybrids, mutations, and grafted plants. This new generation of designer plants includes those that produce phosphorescent fields, fruit from air, and enrich the soil they live on.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoGeology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the quality of our colonies, by lowering maintenance of all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoGeology_Dec
StringTable.String: Over the ages, we have learned that to get the most of a world, you must understand its strengths and weaknesses. By studying a world before we build on it, we have found we can improve the overall quality-of-life for all its citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeatherControlTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the building of the Arcean Weather Control Improvement.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeatherControlTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By maintaining a balanced weather system, we are able to increase the overall quality of our planets, improving the usefulness of almost all of our endeavors.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeatherControlZenithTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the building of the Arcean Weather Control Zenith.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeatherControlZenithTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can not only maintain a stable weather pattern on a colony, but now we can bend the weather to our will, greatly increasing the overall productivity of any world.

StringTable.Label: MasterEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: MasterEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By bending space around our ships, we can use conventional propulsion in a pocket of normal space while accelerating at incredible speeds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FullSpectrumSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build survey ships to investigate anomalies.[BR][BR]Provides a free [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FullSpectrumSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: Analyzing radiation across known spectrums will only get us so far. If we are to increase our understanding of the universe we need to see everything.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarNavigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes available the Navigation Center Civilization Achievement.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarNavigation_Dec
StringTable.String: Since leaving our homeworld, our people have always been great navigators, able to traverse the stars even before the invention of the hyperdrive. The introduction of faster than light travel has done nothing to diminish our skills.

StringTable.Label: MasterNavagation Network_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allow the building of the Galactic Navigation Network.

StringTable.Label: MasterNavagation Network_Dec
StringTable.String: Our interstellar navigators have built a vast network that spans the galaxy. A headquarters where they can direct this network and better coordinate their knowledge will increase their mastery of interstellar space, allowing our ships to move through the galaxy with a surety undreamed of by lesser races.

StringTable.Label: MasterNavigationalExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allow the building of the Galactic Navigators Guild.

StringTable.Label: MasterNavigationalExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: The best navigators in the galaxy are completely reliant on our Navigation Network. The Guild they've formed to regulate its use has given us access to navigational knowhow from across the galaxy, giving our civilization unrivaled navigation techniques.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditions_Dec
StringTable.String: As the heir of the Precursors, we know that our ships are more than tools: they are our loyal companions.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorMysteries_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build the Precursor Protection Field support module.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorMysteries_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered how to reproduce a powerful Precursor Artifact. Though difficult to produce, it can make almost any fleet near-indestructible.

StringTable.Label: MasterLivingShipsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships no longer need to be Maintained, and will self heal

StringTable.Label: MasterLivingShipsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We are now able to create living ships. Unlike our previous forays into artificial life, they have proven to be loyal and helpful companions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Carriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable, and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently, there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and relieve some of the defensive responsibility from our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high-capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, alongside their improved repair, reloading, and recovery facilities, we're now able to deploy high-capacity carriers.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarForgeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the durability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarForgeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By putting our researchers together in a single facility draped in the trappings of our ideology, we'll ensure their devotion borders on religious.

StringTable.Label: MasterRobustHullConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the durability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterRobustHullConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Our teams have found a way to install a portable version of the Integrity fields they use when building ships within the ship itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterArceanHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the durability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterArceanHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Warfare_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of larger hull sizes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Warfare_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, the first step was always going to be the most difficult.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_Dec
StringTable.String: The Champion's Temple trains Altarians in the intricacies of various martial techniques, and the reasons why even an enlightened species must sometimes use force to defend the weak.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Acquisition_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase starbase range, and Awards one free Frigate.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Acquisition_Dec
StringTable.String: Our business must grow. And when the galaxy doesn't provide us empty worlds to grow with, we may have to acquire them from other parties. Developing the tools and techniques to do that now is more than prudent.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with close-minded individuals who resist being shown the Path, or even struggle against it. They must be dealt with harshly. Our own salvation rests on their conversion.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Divine Temple Support Module.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_Dec
StringTable.String: Divine Temples can be installed on appropriately anointed vessels, providing all ships in a fleet a certainty of purpose that they are fighting a righteous cause.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the Hitpoints of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have tasted the lash of slavery, but they have not broken. Now they and their ships have the ability to withstand even the harshest onslaughts.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes our ships' crews more effective when in defensive maneuvers.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_Dec
StringTable.String: Our pilots have learned to link with their ships, and though disciplined thoughts, they can now maneuver their ships with a nimbleness far beyond normal manual control.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increase the abilities of our ships to withstand damage.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more gifted pilots have taken the Defensive Discipline to a new level. They can go into a trance, becoming one with their ships, and allowing them to control their ships as if they were their own bodies. This way, they are able to move through intensive fire without faltering.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. This presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperwaveRadio_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows instant communication across infinite distances, adds a Flagship to your fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperwaveRadio_Dec
StringTable.String: A galactic civilization cannot exist if it takes hours or even years for messages to be sent and received. Hyperwave radio provides instantaneous communication regardless of distance.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialBureaucracy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin building Bureaucratic Offices to manage our growing civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialBureaucracy_Dec
StringTable.String: We're past the point of simply surviving on distant worlds. Now we must thrive there. We shall make a new form of government, one tuned to the organizational requirements of running a colony.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PoliticalCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin trading Diplomatic Capital.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PoliticalCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: It's not enough for a government to know what to do, or even to have the resources to do it. At some point it must convince people to do this for it, to align behind its grand vision.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SovereignImmunity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to use our largest commander ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SovereignImmunity_Dec
StringTable.String: With a strong enough leadership, some of our largest ships could be considered sovereign territory.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialLawAndPolicy_Dec
StringTable.String: For a colony to be effective, it must be filled with many, many people. They will not always agree. We must come up with a system for managing people and their many sins and flaws, a system flexible enough to work on a variety of worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LeadershipRecruiting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Start putting your leaders to more effective use.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LeadershipRecruiting_Dec
StringTable.String: The multiplicative effect a good leader can have on their people cannot be underestimated. The decisions they make can cause everyone around them to become more productive. We need to stop finding good leaders by chance.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarCabinet_Dec
StringTable.String: The Interstellar Cabinet serves as the critical governing nucleus of our galactic civilization. It comprises esteemed ministers from key departments such as Health, Defense, Justice, Production, and Finance. Together, they adeptly steer our burgeoning multi-star civilization, balancing growth, wellbeing, and prosperity across numerous systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfCompliance_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization has certain undesirable elements that are not useful to us when acting on their own. However, once captured they can become valuable assets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfFinance_Dec
StringTable.String: For all the grand speeches we make, nothing would happen if we didn't have the capital to deliver on our promises. We shall form a new department, one focused entirely on the wellbeing of our Treasury.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarCurrency_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of markets in Starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarCurrency_Dec
StringTable.String: Barter has its purposes, but for inter-planetary trade to truly flourish, we will need to develop a currency where value will be recognized no matter whose hands or tentacles it lies in.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of the basic realities of trade need to be reconsidered now that we run a civilization so vast. Free shipping is simply not feasible on a scale of light years, and our buyers and sellers are only now coming to grips with it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: A number of important new theories have been developed to account for the realities of interstellar commerce. We now better understand the costs of shipping, the relative values of items depending on their place in the gravity well, and the potential value of items to alien species. Our economics should reflect this newfound wisdom.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TheInvisibleHand_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TheInvisibleHand_Dec
StringTable.String: For a long time, interstellar trade has been dominated by the government, or the central bodies working closely with us. But a new breed of smaller, more agile organizations are now entering the field, bringing with them a new level of operating efficiency and profit.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: When something is light years away, can you truly be said to own it? Until recently, that's been an assertion only available to the largest and most well-armed of entities. But a new breed of banking system will enable the safe and secure management of assets across the breadth of our civilization for all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FinancialSectors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FinancialSectors_Dec
StringTable.String: Our economists have developed new forms of financial instruments whose values literally hinge on relativistic effects. Unfortunately, these securities require a colossal amount of brainpower and capital to be feasible. However, they say if we can provide that, and also resist the urge to regulate it too closely, the profits could be endless.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EconomicSingularity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the Income on your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EconomicSingularity_Dec
StringTable.String: The premise of an economic singularity is that capital will be instantly and precisely where it needs to be when it needs to be, leading to perfect economic efficiency. Long thought to be merely theoretical, our economic wisdom is now so advanced we may actually witness one.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfTruth_Dec
StringTable.String: A government agency dedicated to ensuring trust and safety for all citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DomesticPolicyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: It sometimes escapes the mind that for all the numbers we deal with - resources, money, ships - there are real people with real needs behind them all. We should examine those needs and address them head on, so the important numbers keep going up.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: It's important to give people a feeling that their voice is being heard, even in a situation that requires as much central control as a colony. This new form of colonial government should help raise spirits and boost productivity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfHealth_Dec
StringTable.String: That living on alien worlds would put a strain on our people's health was predictable. But we maybe should have predicted it a bit harder. A new Ministry, dedicated to the health of our people, will ensure we continue to have a happy, growing population.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfJustice_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're not careful, our trade will be siphoned off by pirates and criminals. A ministry dedicated to law enforcement will ensure this is stopped, or at least directed to pirates and criminals of our choosing.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfCulture_Dec
StringTable.String: Calling our cultural exports 'soft power' dangerously undersells them. Our culture will do far more to spread our influence, values, and way of life across this galaxy than hard power ever will. And this new government department will ensure it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin specializing Entertainers on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: It shouldn't take more than a few small tweaks to our media to make them more palatable to alien beings. Embedded translations, cross-cultural product placement, and UV and infrared-corrected palettes will be a good start.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that peoples across the galaxy are hooked on our media, we should use their enthusiasm to spread our values further. Subtle messaging campaigns, well timed endorsements, and tasteful subliminal effects will ensure our values become the galaxy's values.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: For too long our cultural efforts have focused on low-hanging fruit, capturing the interest of only the most easily amused aliens. It's worked, but by tuning our cultural output to more refined alien tastes, we'll be sure to see greater effects.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: We need to remove the barriers - legal, social, economic - preventing our people from settling outside our civilization. This won't be a loss to us, but a gain, an emigration that will help spread our civilization further than we ever could ourselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: By adopting newcomers more readily into our cultural practices and ways of life, we'll create advocates for our civilization. Advocates who look and speak like the aliens around them, and are all the more convincing because of it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarResorts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provide the most popular entertainment for your worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarResorts_Dec
StringTable.String: By adopting newcomers more readily into our cultural practices and ways of life, we'll create advocates for our civilization. Advocates who look and speak like the aliens around them, and are all the more convincing because of it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: Imitation is far more than the sincerest form of the flattery. It is a form of conquest. If the people of alien worlds begin talking like us, acting like us, and thinking like us, they become us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading our Influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: A new longitudinal study has revealed the effects our culture has on alien minds. We shall use this knowledge, along with the latest market research on rapidly flashing colors, to compose media more appealing than ever before. For we now know what they like better than they do.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SharedIdeology_Dec
StringTable.String: A new longitudinal study has revealed the effects our culture has on alien minds. We shall use this knowledge, along with the latest market research on rapidly flashing colors, to compose media more appealing than ever before. For we now know what they like better than they do.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalConquest_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the spread of our colonies' Influence. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalConquest_Dec
StringTable.String: It's important to be clear: What we're doing is not mind control. It's better than that. We are showing aliens a better way of living. Our way of living. It's their own minds that are coming to these conclusions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KaxxCryptography_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlock a mystery the Kaxx have been trying to decipher for decades.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KaxxCryptography_Dec
StringTable.String: The Kaxx discovered a creature slumbering in the core of their world. Around the cocoon they found strange diagrams and markings. They must mean something?

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin communicating with aliens, and use the Galactic Bazaar.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The same encoding patterns show up again and again in languages, even ones that evolved light-years apart. Having seen enough of alien languages to confirm our theories, our scientists are now capable of devising a truly universal translator.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Req1
StringTable.String: Must have contact with an alien species.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForeignAffairs_Dec
StringTable.String: The worst thing to occur in diplomacy is to be caught by surprise. An ideal negotiation has all its discussions and sidebars mapped out long in advance. This new ministry, dedicated to the study of our interactions with alien civilizations, will ensure we avoid any missteps.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Diplomacy_Dec
StringTable.String: We thought we understood diplomacy from our own history, dealing with our own kind. But diplomacy with aliens is an order of magnitude more complicated, and will require special expertise and training to even begin. The handshake etiquette alone seems nearly impossible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Espionage_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't expect aliens to play fairly with us, and they will not expect or reward the same naivet? in us. Whether we're acquiring information, technologies, or preparing for war, we should be ready to use any means available to us, including espionage.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TradePacts_Dec
StringTable.String: While a simple idea on the surface, an interstellar trade pact contains a dizzying number of details to consider. Only if done properly will both we and our alien counterparts profit handsomely.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Alliances_Dec
StringTable.String: There are terrible things in this galaxy, beings and races who are bent on war. We will have a better chance of standing against them if we stand together with the more reasonable of our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Eminence_Dec
StringTable.String: We can do better than coexist with our neighbors. We can thrive. Eminence describes the pinnacle of diplomatic relations, a pact between species so comprehensive it verges on symbiosis.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoReligions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Faith may help lead us into the next era.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoReligions_Dec
StringTable.String: These are confusing times for our people, who have many questions about our place in the universe. We need a new guidestar, informed by interstellar realities, yes, but also one based on our own history and the words of our great prophets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DivineEssence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can become one with the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DivineEssence_Dec
StringTable.String: So many things that once confused us are now clear. Our race to the stars doesn't have to lead to an era of confusion and moral decay. We just needed perspective on a galactic scale to see how true our values were.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoTheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Faith may help lead us into the next era.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoTheology_Dec
StringTable.String: The moral health of our people is too great a thing to leave to chance. We should dedicate real effort and real resources to ensuring our people are strong, not just externally, but internally as well.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorOrigins_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Investigation into ancient systems could unlock new ships for our Commanders.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorOrigins_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors were more than just aliens, more than just another civilization that trod these stars before us. The Precursors show up - in metaphor if nothing else - in our own religious texts. Our faith isn't just a moral textbook. It may be a map of both our past and our future.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MithrilarianEpics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Faith may help lead us into the next era.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MithrilarianEpics_Dec
StringTable.String: Before the Precursors there were beings known as the Mithrilar. Their actions and technology appear to be responsible for what we now call reality. 'Action' may be the wrong word though - the Mithrilar were strange creatures. We must study more. But even this incomplete knowledge has granted us immeasurable inner-strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MascrinthusAndDraginol_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Faith may help lead us into the next era.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MascrinthusAndDraginol_Dec
StringTable.String: Among the Mithrilar, two stand tall: Draginol and Mascrinthus. Friends, maybe foes, or possibly of a relationship unknowable to us, it was their actions, or even mere existence, that has led to this all. Immeasurably ancient beings, yet it feels like we know them. Like they've been with us all this time.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TradeNetworks_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin building trade networks.[BR][BR]Provides a free [HS=HS_Freighter]Freighter[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TradeNetworks_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't be clumsy when it comes to managing trade - a heavy hand will reduce the profits for all parties. But we can't leave it all to the private sector either. Our alien trade partners will certainly have the benefit of help from their governments.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the reach of our trade networks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading between our galactic peers poses several challenges we need to address: The distances involved, forms of payments, and delivery terms, among others. Even arranging compatible power adapters is a tricky proposition.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PreferredLending_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the reach of our trade networks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PreferredLending_Dec
StringTable.String: All forms of trade are made easier if credit is involved, which greatly reduces the friction in submitting and receiving payment. But credit requires trust, and to do that with aliens requires great care. We'll have to come up with very special systems to manage it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OpenTradePolicy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the reach of our trade networks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OpenTradePolicy_Dec
StringTable.String: Taking the brakes off our civilization's trade policy poses several great risks. The profit potential is enormous, but we'll have to ensure we have adequate information and monitoring policies in place first.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the reach of our trade networks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We've never traded like this before. Anywhere in the galaxy, you may find the products of our civilization. And in return, the galaxy's treasures arrive at our doorstep, fresh as you like, at a very reasonable price. We have mastered trade like few beings have before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By investing in Tourism we will draw more tourists, and their money, to our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MinistryOfTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Tax breaks, coordinated advertising campaigns, and investment in shared infrastructure are just some of the activities a centralized department of tourism could do for us. We should invest in this now, and reap the rewards later.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By investing in Tourism we will draw more tourists, and their money, to our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Our worlds have so much to offer, from natural beauty to our own distinct cultural attractions. We should open the doors for visitors from other worlds to sample our treasures. And, not coincidentally, leave their money behind.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OpenImmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By investing in Tourism we will draw more tourists, and their money, to our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OpenImmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: If we make it easier for aliens to visit our worlds, they will bring their wealth with them. There are other cultural benefits, to be sure, probably. But the accountants seem very excited about the money.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WondersOfTheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By investing in Tourism we will draw more tourists, and their money, to our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WondersOfTheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: We should construct a place so grand in scope and beauty that people from across known space find themselves inexorably drawn to it, to marvel at its uniqueness. And when we've done that, we should build another.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticRecruitment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By investing in Tourism we will draw more tourists, and their money, to our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticRecruitment_Dec
StringTable.String: We've always advertised our civilization's wonders and great cultural value. But now we are doing more, not just passively showing what we have to offer, but explicitly seeking out aliens and foreigners who will be the most receptive to our civilization's charms.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: For the true student of our civilization - alien or other - it's not enough to visit our great cultural sites. They need to live our lives, see the great events of our history through their own eye or eyes. And now, with the latest immersive cortical stimulation technologies, they can do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UpgradedLasers_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered alien laser systems. Given enough time, our scientists can incorporate this into our technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UpgradedMissiles_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered alien missile systems. Given enough time our scientists can incorporate this into our technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UpgradedKinetic_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered alien kinetic systems. Given enough time our scientists can incorporate this into our technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DreadlordWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Dreadlord technology will provide a powerful boost to our weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DreadlordWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered Dreadlord weapons. Given enough time our scientists can incorporate this into our technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: MasterDigitalExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the efficacy of trade between colonies and other species.

StringTable.Label: MasterDigitalExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the efficacy of trade between colonies and other species.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Studying a few Precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Temple and Ministry.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the primary doctrine of the ancient Krynniac religion. It is the set of core teachings, ideals, and laws that the Krynn must live by to bring them closer to learning the true Way of the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Mission.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Once a Krynn has commenced along the Path, the next step is for them to find their Calling. It is though service to their Calling that the Krynn contribute to the overarching goal of our people, spreading the Krynniac Way.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Order and Sanctuary.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Orders were founded to help Krynn take the last step on the Path, and find the Way. These Orders are the glue which hold the Krynn together, ensuring the Krynniac Way will eventually be found by all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Oracle.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At the end of the Path one finds the Way. The Way reveals the truth of our universe to those who behold it, and teaches those so enlightened that they must forever help others walk the Path, until all beings in the universe live as one.

StringTable.Label: MasterBlackMarketTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build a Black Market.

StringTable.Label: MasterBlackMarketTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, others often come into possession of various bits of money. By giving them a place to trade, we can boost their productivity, improving manufacturing and research. And take their money.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Xeno Anthropology Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the natives of this universe, we are able to better interact with them. It also allows us to educate them in the proper way of doing things: our way.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Universal Outreach Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the ways of this Universe. Now we can use our knowledge to better interact with the natives, further spreading our influence in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Future Studies Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying what we know of the future, we are able to influence the fate of this dimension.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Marketing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Marketing_Dec
StringTable.String: Our storefronts and marketplaces are more than just a place to earn a profit, although they certainly do that. They also serve as the public face of our company, the truest representation of what we are, and help spread our influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MarketingMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MarketingMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout the galaxy, sentient life talks of the marvels present in an Iridium World complex. Providing the ultimate consumption experience, Iridium Worlds boost the economy of their host worlds like few other structures.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_Dec
StringTable.String: There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Krynniac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Krynn in their own way.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path does not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization is granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are then free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase tourism income and influence on all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of tourism is finally paying dividends. All who visit our worlds find themselves filled with the urge to return home and extol the virtues of the Path to their own kind.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ProcessorUpgrades_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ProcessorUpgrades_Dec
StringTable.String: Unbound by the limitations of flesh, a technology can improve all of our citizens at once.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PredictiveProcessors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PredictiveProcessors_Dec
StringTable.String: Unbound by the limitations of flesh, a technology can improve all of our citizens at once.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ReinforcedCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Diligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ReinforcedCore_Dec
StringTable.String: We have improved the design of our citizens. And we can upgrade our current citizens to the improved design.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AmbientEnergy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Diligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AmbientEnergy_Dec
StringTable.String: By drawing on the energy of the universe, our citizens reduce their need for rest.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Starbases_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to start building Starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Starbases_Dec
StringTable.String: No mere outpost in orbit, a starbase is an extension of our very civilization, containing everything that makes us who we are. Including, not incidentally, our incredible defensive and ship-building capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ModuleAssembly_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to start building Modules in our Shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ModuleAssembly_Dec
