StringTable.String: [ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +100% Approval to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +5 Credits per turn any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 Research points to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +100% influence per turn of any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +150 Points to the base influence of any colony while ship is stationed there.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Malevolent_Icon] +1 Culture Points each time ship, or fleet it is in, wins a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Prototype Mass drivers.[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long range.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% to the moves of all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] All ships in fleet receive a free 10 points of shields defense.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% range to all weapons in fleet.[BR][ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% rate of fire to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Evasion to all ships in fleet.[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Accuracy to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] All ships in fleet ignore 75% of all mass driver damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent23_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StatTooltipBreakdown_Military_Icon] +100% to military production to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent24_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +50% fleet evasion and salvages 250 Credits each time it survives a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent01_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +100% to the Area of Effect of any starbase at which the ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Turn any one dead planet into a Class 16 Habitable planet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] Instantly Flips any non-capital planet in Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +25% manufacturing to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +25% Research to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent06_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +25% Credits per turn to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent07_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +10% Raw Production to any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +250 Points to the base influence and +100% influence per turn of any planet at which ship is stationed.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Assault drones[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Escort drones.[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 5 Assault Fighters.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype Mass drivers.[BR][ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] High defenses of all types.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful Beam Weapons.[BR][ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] Only takes up 2 Logistics points.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful missile weapons.[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 6 Escort drones.[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 10 Assault Fighters.[BR][ICON=JammingIcon] 50% Evasion to all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent15_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful Mass Drivers.[BR][ICON=KineticRangeIcon] +100% mass driver range.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent16_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful Beam Weapons.[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Ignores 75% of Beam Damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent17_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] +50% to the all defenses in fleet.[BR][ICON=JammingIcon] 75% Dodge.[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] Powerful Prototype Weapons.[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% Moves to all ships in fleet.[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Entire Fleet is given 350 tile Range.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] +10 to the all defenses in fleet.[BR][ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignores 75% of all damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Powerful Mass Drivers.[BR][ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Increases strategic and tactical repair for entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: Old Module was removed do to game mechanic changes. (Left as placeholder)

StringTable.Label: Component_SuppressCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets in this ship's radius have [ICON=CrimeIcon32] -100% Crime.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Elembrial_Dec
StringTable.String: This warship projects shields for all ships in its fleet.

StringTable.Label: Ship_FloatingFortress_Dec
StringTable.String: The science ship of the Mercenary Crane.

StringTable.Label: Ship_GoldenBazaar_Dec
StringTable.String: Always seeking out new business opportunites.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Nail_Dec
StringTable.String: A small but sturdy precursor warship.

StringTable.Label: Ship_CosmosDread_Dec
StringTable.String: The "flagship" of the great pirate Starbeard. Little more than a asteroid miner with a gun.

StringTable.Label: Ship_TheArc_Dec
StringTable.String: Filled with flora and fauna from around the galaxy, this a flying ecology lab.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Praxis_Dec
StringTable.String: The warship of the brutal and malevolent LL-88.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Prospector_Dec
StringTable.String: There are things out there that you would not believe.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Independence_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship known to seek freedom and adventure in the open expanse.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Enforcer_Dec
StringTable.String: Citizens are compelled to work hard under the oppressive shadow of this menacing vessel.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Goodwill_Dec
StringTable.String: A symbol of peace known throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Negotiator_Dec
StringTable.String: Where you negotiate is just as important as what you negotiate.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Zarkov_Dec
StringTable.String: Things happen on this ship. Only a black light will tell the tale.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Sander_Name_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with things. Let's go get them.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Raptor_Dec
StringTable.String: This experimental warship was designed by trillionaire E.G. Arms. The components used in its construction are the result of his life's work, though tragically he died before construction began.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Retribution_Dec
StringTable.String: Reconstructed from parts that were scattered across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Sabre_Dec
StringTable.String: The small and beam resistant warship of the Mercenary Prince Viturian.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Splinter_Dec
StringTable.String: Other probes explore the universe. This probe deconstructs anything it finds along the way.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Stargazer_Dec
StringTable.String: A precursor probe that has been recently reactivated.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Whisper_Dec
StringTable.String: The administrative ship of the Mercenary Retuio III.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Ysengard_Dec
StringTable.String: The armed ship of the Mirazu Ysen.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Bacchanal_Dec
StringTable.String: The raucous party barge of the Mercenary Annjeanette Sil.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip02_Dec
StringTable.String: The incredibly resilient Colony Ship of the Mercenary Kootu Erji.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip05_Dec
StringTable.String: The freighter of the resilient mercenary Fitrios Pompados.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip06_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursor-researching science ship of the Mercenary Dr. Jondi Ians.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip07_Dec
StringTable.String: The approval boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Inquisitor.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip08_Dec
StringTable.String: The economy boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Kalli Datun.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip09_Dec
StringTable.String: The research boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Melkiur Savante.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip10_Dec
StringTable.String: The influence boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Ghhhhhhsk.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip11_Dec
StringTable.String: The influence boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Master of Tongues.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip16_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful missile warship of the Mercenary Admiral Waro.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip17_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful beam warship of the Mercenary, The Night Fist.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip21_Dec
StringTable.String: The evasion and accuracy boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Strafford Leet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip22_Dec
StringTable.String: The mass-driver negating Support Ship of the Mercenary Ban Seurt of Illia.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip23_Dec
StringTable.String: The military production boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Yiyiz Ziyiy.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip24_Dec
StringTable.String: The salvage ship of the Mercenary Evelon Masha.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip01_Dec
StringTable.String: The Starbase boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Laqt Reecher.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip02_Dec
StringTable.String: The terraforming ship of the Mercenary The Last Boyar.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip03_Dec
StringTable.String: The mysterious Constructor Ship of the Mercenary ruire podaq nu.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip09_Dec
StringTable.String: The overstuffed carrier of the Mercenary Flockeader Jat.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip13_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful and balanced warship of the Mercenary Poelacca.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip14_Dec
StringTable.String: The massive and jamming-equipped carrier of the Mercenary XRT80-DEF.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip15_Dec
StringTable.String: The Dreadnought of the Mercenary Enopriumta Xu.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip16_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful beam cruiser of the Mercenary The Elder Kriat.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip18_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful Prototype warship of the Mercenary Hon Malteuse.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip19_Dec
StringTable.String: The speed and range boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Kelpie Wittque.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip20_Dec
StringTable.String: The defense-boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Brootus.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip21_Dec
StringTable.String: The Prototype warship of the Mercenary Shade.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip22_Dec
StringTable.String: The well armed and armored assault ship of the Mercenary Slim Tuir.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterTiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Creatures from another dimension, drawn to places of power and loss.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterSmall_Dec
StringTable.String: Hunters from another dimension who tear apart ships and feast on their energy systems.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterMedium_Dec
StringTable.String: Drawn to dying suns, and the shattered worlds they leave behind.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterLarge_Dec
StringTable.String: Nearly ever alien species shares a common mythology of a horrific visit from one of these creatures.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterHuge_Dec
StringTable.String: Fortunately rare, the queen's presence brings madness and death.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Victory_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype attack ship. Dangerous and fast, if we can find someone willing to pilot it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Curiosity_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially outfitted to examine the universe, we quickly determined that it also needed to be able to defend itself against what it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Perserverance_Dec
StringTable.String: The Perseverance is the symbol of our progress and was launched with a worldwide celebration.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Gaze_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype laser and shields large enough to defend an entire fleet make this a dangerous command ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_HivebaseOne_Dec
StringTable.String: Do not be fooled by the weak weapons and lack of defenses. This is a floating drone platform that can battle entire enemy fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Apex_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military flagship. Gifted by a trillionaire military contractor. We only need to find someone worthy to command it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Sickle_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron7_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin1_Dec
StringTable.String: A tactical AI allows this ship to integrate itself easily into larger fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron1_Dec
StringTable.String: A tactical AI allows this ship to integrate itself easily into larger fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin2_Dec
StringTable.String: Less of a ship and more of a prototype laser with an engine attached. The more experience the crew gets with the laser, the more powerful it will become.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin3_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially designed to counter rebellions this warship is equally adept at forcing good behavior from our workers and our enemies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin4_Dec
StringTable.String: Loaded with a vast array of recording equipment this ship is able to record every victory in great detail. And play it back for those who question our strength.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin5_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary ship is feared by our enemies for its ability to quickly recover from battle and fight again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron5_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary ship is feared by our enemies for its ability to quickly recover from battle and fight again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin6_Dec
StringTable.String: This powerful warship is a forge for munitions during times of war and production during times of peace.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin7_Dec
StringTable.String: This flagship is a symbol of our empire. The sight of it inspires our citizens and soliders alike.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator1_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel to the edge of the universe, and transmit back what it finds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator2_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially outfitted to examine the universe, we quickly determined that it also needed to be able to defend itself against what it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator3_Dec
StringTable.String: The limitations of physical space are more flexible than we might believe.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator4_Dec
StringTable.String: By deconstructing matter this ship can create new materials. But the process should be done far away from civilized worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator5_Dec
StringTable.String: We applaud the scientific analysis that this ship is able to perform after a battle, even if the process is rather gruesome.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator6_Dec
StringTable.String: We have always desired to live among the stars. The fortunate inhabitants of this generational ship are able to experience it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator7_Dec
StringTable.String: Fully self-sustaining this ship is able to travel to the edge of the universe, and destroy anything it encounters along the way.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron2_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially designed to recover raw materials from asteroids, the process was even easier when used on enemy ships.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron3_Dec
StringTable.String: A nightmarish egg chamber fills the hull of this ship. By exposing captured crew to the newly hatched we can convert them to our cause.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron4_Dec
StringTable.String: We applaud the scientific analysis that this ship is able to perform after a battle, even if the process is rather gruesome.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship has many names amongst different civilizations; Werewolf, Blood Angel, Falling Star. But no matter the name, it is always spoken of in fear.

StringTable.Label: Commander_EndlessZeros_Dec
StringTable.String: Every aspect of this ship is automated. Making it easy for a single commander to control.

StringTable.Label: Commander_VoidInTime_Dec
StringTable.String: Also known as "Wavemaker" and "Chariot" this ship leads its fleet, pulling them ahead as it warps space around them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_SufferingWithin_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship was discovered after the entire crew committed suicide. Despite its reputation, it has been repurposed.

StringTable.Label: Commander_BeforeCreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to empower an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_AfterDeath_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to defend an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_InfiniteResolve_Dec
StringTable.String: A warship and a cannon production foundry.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Nameless_Dec
StringTable.String: A repair ship so advanced it is able to rebuild nearby ships while traveling and during battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Appeleur_Dec
StringTable.String: Onboard construction allows an almost endless supply of probes to be sent out into the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Wisp_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary escape ship particularly suited to outrun Drengin fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Puca_Dec
StringTable.String: Enemy fleets have been drawn out to deep space attempting to attack the nimble Puca.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Loireag_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary ship initially designed to provide housing for the rapidly growing crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Harpazein_Dec
StringTable.String: Also called "Dreamlight" or "Mist" this ship's crew has reported visions and vivid dreams.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Dullahan_Dec
StringTable.String: Generations are born and spend their entire lives within the intense training bays on this ship. The first time they touch land it is as part of an invasion.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Gruff_Dec
StringTable.String: A floating forge more than a warship, able to produce an entire fleet given the time and materials.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi1_Dec
StringTable.String: Eufemie was a famous Xeloxi raider. Though she disappeared on a Refuge port, her legendary ship remains.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi2_Dec
StringTable.String: This ships weapons are calibrated to immobilize an enemy rather than destroy. Often allowing the enemy ship to be captured.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi3_Dec
StringTable.String: Called "Blood Tooth" among the pirates. This ship is known to hide within asteroid belts and launch missiles at vulnerable targets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi4_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a monument on Refuge that lists the ships destroyed by Killigrew. As the list grows, so does the the legend.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi5_Dec
StringTable.String: An alien engine allows the ship to drop out of real space, through a pocket universe and out a few light weeks away. Which the crew uses to escape battles.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi6_Dec
StringTable.String: Haunted by those killed in a brutal massacre. No matter what is done those spirits remain, and no matter what is done to the ship it remains as well.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi7_Dec
StringTable.String: Home to the worst criminals of the Xeloxi empire, and many others. Murders are frequent, but insurrections are contained due to a security system that points inwards instead of out.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium1_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally a precursor reclamation ship. It has since been repurposed to survey anomalies and defend itself.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium2_Dec
StringTable.String: While the exo-corporations competed for the highest and most luxurious resorts, Panetta surpassed them all by creating one in space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium3_Dec
StringTable.String: Protecting trade lanes is key to the survival of the Corporate Sector. And no ship has done more toward that purpose than this one.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium4_Dec
StringTable.String: Harondin's personal ship was where he began to build his considerable fortune. He no longer has time to captain it himself, but it is still an impressive ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium5_Dec
StringTable.String: An unusual ship in that it allows anyone to board regardless of species or alliance. This causes numerous issues, but it also created a central marketplace that rivals those on any world.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium6_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally intended to transport and quickly deploy city sized trade events. It was just as easy to transport soldiers as it was salesmen.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium7_Dec
StringTable.String: A galactic wonder often compared to a fully functional city on its own. Generations of citizens live out their lives on this ship and catering to the visitors to nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean1_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally designed for an Arcean wargame, the Valiant was quickly redeployed for more practical purposes.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ship of the Arcean Council of Judges and capable of delivering justice on their behalf.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean3_Dec
StringTable.String: An alien ship of unknown origin. The Arceans found and equipped it to serve their purposes.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean4_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship was expelled from a dimensional rift. It appears to be of Arcean design, but from undiscovered technology.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean5_Dec
StringTable.String: Lord Vega's legendary warship. Its appearance above a world is both inspiring and terrifying.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean6_Dec
StringTable.String: The Elysium only accepts the most talented warriors among its crew. Many aspire to one day join its ranks.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean7_Dec
StringTable.String: Flagship for the Arcean fleet. As its legend grows, so does its power.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath1_Dec
StringTable.String: Called 'the Meteroite' by Drath admirers this ship was a prototype developed to explore space and armed to deal with anything it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath2_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype ship designed to deal with any threats it may encounter.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath3_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with enough life support to keep a single commander alive perpetually.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath4_Dec
StringTable.String: Inspired by a Drath swamp moth that is able to control its victims and force them to fight the thralls of other moths.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath5_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally designed as a mercenary ship the Drath could loan to other empires. In the end they decided to keep it for themselves.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath6_Dec
StringTable.String: Drath flagship and heart of their command.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath7_Dec
StringTable.String: Many believe this ship is only a rumor. It has never been seen in battle, mostly because it destroys enemy fleets before it gets close to them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak1_Dec
StringTable.String: The fertile seeds grown here can be used to germinate nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak2_Dec
StringTable.String: The living hull of this ships heals almost as quickly as damage is taken.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak3_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary transport ship that any colony would be glad to have nearby.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak4_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a sentience at the heart of this ship. And though most of the Baratak heartwells are calm and patient, this one dreams of war.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak5_Dec
StringTable.String: The most notable feature of this ship is the ability to produce living atmospheric filters that improve all nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak6_Dec
StringTable.String: A bastion of life and growth.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak7_Dec
StringTable.String: The mothership of the Baratak empire.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance1_Dec
StringTable.String: A quick attack ship designed to keep Resistance borders safe.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance2_Dec
StringTable.String: A modest ship whose attack grows with level.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance3_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary fleet defender designed to support allied fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance4_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes called the "Eyes of Heaven". This ship builds a subspace relay network as it travels, increasing its sensor range over time.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance5_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship that excels not because of innovative technology, but an incredibly talented team devoted to their work and each other.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance6_Dec
StringTable.String: The foundry on board this warship can service an entire fleet, and keep them ready for battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance7_Dec
StringTable.String: The Resistance flagship and core of their military strength.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian1_Dec
StringTable.String: The wandering ship of the Altarians is known to bring luck to the remote worlds it visits, as well as securing transport to and from them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian2_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship enhances the psychic powers of the commander, allowing them to detect and examine foreign objects in a way few other species can.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a unique ability to tie into local communication and data channels this ship is almost immediately reinforced when it is within its borders. And vulnerable when it is outside of them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian4_Dec
StringTable.String: A failed attempt to be able to witness the future instead created a system able to see the past. Less useful, but still valuable when surveying anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian5_Dec
StringTable.String: Also called the Queen, the Altarian Cloak or SkyGlaive. This legendary warship reinforces both nearby fleets and worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is home to the Altarian War Council. And though they prefer not to engage in war their influence is far reaching.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian7_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian psychics cover a wide range of abilities. Those that can kill with their powers either have their abilities severed, or are assigned to crew this ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Torians discovered a dead god, a floating mechanical titan in deep space. The titan was destroyed beyond repair, except for the eye, which they fashioned into a ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian2_Dec
StringTable.String: The ship the Torian's used to flee from the Drengin. Despite the Torian appearance it is actually a stolen Drengin ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian3_Dec
StringTable.String: Often called Starbubble or Slingshot this ship was designed for speed and can quickly respond to emergencies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian4_Dec
StringTable.String: The antimatter that powers this ship's engine is flawed causing wakes in temporal space when the ship moves. The crew has learned to use these wakes to slow enemy fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian5_Dec
StringTable.String: A wide variety of recording equipment allow the Torian civilization, and many others, to watch the battles of this legendary ship as they occur.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian6_Dec
StringTable.String: First designed as an escape ship for the growing Torian population. Now it has been outfitted as a warship instead.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian7_Dec
StringTable.String: The Torian dream of living among the stars, no longer vulnerable to invasion or environmental collapse. This ship is the first move toward that dream.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti1_Dec
StringTable.String: The sovereign's personal transport has an impressive onboard lab. It is unknown if that's for investigation or Babble's personal experiments.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti2_Dec
StringTable.String: A fierce, though small, warship with surprisingly powerful weapons. Originally designed to deal with guarded anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti3_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to be almost invisible to detection and with an impressive sensor range of its own it is well suited to explore anomalies in distant space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti4_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed as a habitat for the lost generation of Manti. And once they are found, to provide enough defenses to ensure that they aren't lost again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti5_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship wasn't constructed, but discovered deep in Brachyura's ocean. Though it wasn't Manti technology they were able to activate it and put it to use.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is a collection of autonomous, specialized capsules that together are able to perform space travel, initiate combat and sustain a crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti7_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to lay claim to the anomalies in the deepest reaches of space, and destroy anything it finds there.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn1_Dec
StringTable.String: Infinite range allows this probe to spread the message of the Way out to the farthest reaches of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn2_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to collect religious artifacts for the Way, this ship is equally well suited to analyzing mundane anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn3_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to defend the sacred worlds of the Way, or destroy those that threaten them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn4_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary warship is the subject of daily benedictions by the Way and all of its members.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn5_Dec
StringTable.String: Used as the symbol of faith within the Way. When not involved in missions it often hosts delegations and the most important religious conferences.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is fully crewed by clergy. But that doesn't make the warship any less formidable in battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn7_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian1_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed for quick response to enemy threats the first sign this ship has arrived is usually a flurry of laser fire.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian2_Dec
StringTable.String: Little is known about this mysterious ship or its crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian3_Dec
StringTable.String: Typically patroling Iconian borders and allowing its powerful sensors to detect anything beyond.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian4_Dec
StringTable.String: Iso's personal warship. Occasionally he loans it out to able commanders in times of need.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian5_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally a deep space lab, it was eventually outfitted with engines and weapons to protect the technological secrets it contains.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian6_Dec
StringTable.String: The new promise of the Iconian civilization. Vast clone chambers allows both spur the growth of nearby worlds and help guarantee that the Iconians will survive another extinction level event.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian7_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is the flagship of the Grey, a Iconian military division given authority to operate independently of Iconian oversight or restriction.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx1_Dec
StringTable.String: Unable to give chase to pirate raiders, the Arkose is more than happy to allow its missiles to do it instead.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx2_Dec
StringTable.String: The guns from this ship were recovered from a crashed alien vessel. They are centuries old, but the Hive recently figured out how to power them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx3_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful lasers on the Breccia are actually mining lasers. But they work just as well for cutting through enemy hulls.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx4_Dec
StringTable.String: Powerful missiles accompany a point defense system so advanced that it can protect an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx5_Dec
StringTable.String: For the Hive, Promethion is the source of life. And the inner chambers of this ship are able to reverse the reaction and transmute the life of defeated enemies into Promethion.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx6_Dec
StringTable.String: More of a mobile starbase than a ship, Hornfels is able to assist in the production of nearby worlds. And defend them if needed.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx7_Dec
StringTable.String: This flagship of the Hive is sacred and many say it exposure to Promethion has caused it to become sentient.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordTiny_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the thousands of Dreadlord scout ships.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordSmall_Dec
StringTable.String: Tactical fighters intended to decimate enemies or identify hardened targets.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordMedium_Dec
StringTable.String: A powerful warship whose presence causes organic life anxiety and nightmares.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline1_Dec
StringTable.String: Developed in responce to an unprovoked attack. It miraculously survied the battle and remains a symbol of strength and hope.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline2_Dec
StringTable.String: A criminal syndicate created this warship before turning on each other, leaving only this functional warship behind.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline3_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship accepts telepathic commands as well as haptic controls. Making it dangerous both to its enemies and the pilot connected to it in battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline4_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed initially for a wealthy trader and outfitted with the best of everything. It is as beautiful as it is deadly.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline5_Dec
StringTable.String: Often called the Little Moon as it is frequently seen in the night sky above the homeworld it guards.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline6_Dec
StringTable.String: An entire space ecosystem, for those that have no need for food. Entire decks are dedicated to entertainment, education and manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline7_Dec
StringTable.String: Intended to be a diplomatic vessel for visting neighboring civilizations. A significant armament ensures that diplomacy remains peaceful.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath1_Dec
StringTable.String: Developed in responce to an unprovoked attack. It miraculously survied the battle and remains a symbol of strength and hope.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath2_Dec
StringTable.String: A criminal syndicate created this warship before turning on each other, leaving only this functional warship behind.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath3_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship accepts telepathic commands as well as haptic controls. Making it dangerous both to its enemies and the pilot connected to it in battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath4_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed initially for a wealthy trader and outfitted with the best of everything. It is as beautiful as it is deadly.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath5_Dec
StringTable.String: Often called the Little Moon as it is frequently seen in the night sky above the homeworld it guards.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath6_Dec
StringTable.String: An entire space ecosystem, for those that have no need for food. Entire decks are dedicated to entertainment, education and manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath7_Dec
StringTable.String: Intended to be a diplomatic vessel for visting neighboring civilizations. A significant armament ensures that diplomacy remains peaceful.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship has state of the art sensors so that passengers can see through the walls to the outside at all times.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing2_Dec
StringTable.String: Known for its numerous beam weapons, can unleash a dazzling light show that can be seen from kilometers away in space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing3_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is equipped with specialized equipment for recording various anomaly phenomena for future viewing.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing4_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with focused lense technology, which work by harnessing and amplifying the energy output of each ship's beam weapons, thereby significantly increasing their attack power.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing5_Dec
StringTable.String: Possesses a sophisticated vulnerability detection system, capable of revealing the most minute flaws in enemy armor, paving the way for devastating, efficient attacks..

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is renowned throughout the cosmos for its advanced targeting system that can accurately track multiple enemy ships simultaneously across vast distances.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing7_Dec
StringTable.String: With its extraordinary sensor ranges, this ship has the unique ability to peer deep into the galaxy, offering unparalleled views and early detection of distant celestial objects and phenomena.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is notorious for its continuous squirming and abrupt twitching, making it an unpredictable target.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated2_Dec
StringTable.String: Little is known about this beast's internal organs since no instruments can penetrate its incredibly dense skin.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated3_Dec
StringTable.String: Stare down the bow of this beast, and you will understand why they call her teeth.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated4_Dec
StringTable.String: This beast has a unique genetic condition causing constant metamorphosis of its skin and carapace. Its hitpoints are randomaly modified between -50% and + 50% after each victory.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated5_Dec
StringTable.String: The creature this ship was fused with has parasites that she can shed on command, this makes for a devestating invasion force.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated6_Dec
StringTable.String: This beast boasts exceptional eyesight, enabling it to spot and target enemies from incredible distances with ease.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated7_Dec
StringTable.String: A genuine cosmic horror, this Leviathan embodies the terrifying possibilities of merging the organic with the mechanical. After a battle is finished, it digests the debris and disabled ships from the battlefield.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth1_Dec
StringTable.String: The D'Auroth was the first ship commissioned with the intent to explore distant stars for new life.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Due' Lumineras was the first ship to utilize technology that changed interior lighting to match the season, vastly improving the space-faring experience.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth3_Dec
StringTable.String: In battle, the Due' Soleary is viewed as the star of conflict -a large body quickly burning any that get too close. At least so says the battle-averse Advance.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth4_Dec
StringTable.String: The Due' Éclipse is not formally recognized by the Advance, and no records are kept. As far as most Phalenoids know, the ship doesn't exist.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth5_Dec
StringTable.String: A heavy transport ship, the D'Comètaut is boasted as the most secure way to travel. It was initially designed to assist diplomatic missions.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth6_Dec
StringTable.String: A ceremonial flagship, the D'Radieut is the star of any fleet. The ship's slow move speed and heavy armor make it ideally suited for defense.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth7_Dec
StringTable.String: A surprisingly nimble flagship. The Due' Céles was designed to respond quickly to calls for aid across known star systems.

StringTable.Label: ResearchMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a research mission to the outer rim.

StringTable.Label: ResearchMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research mission has finished, resulting in some valuable new knowledge that we can apply to our ongoing research efforts. We have added 50 tech points towards our next research project!

StringTable.Label: ProductionMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a mining mission to the outer rim.

StringTable.Label: ProductionMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our production mission has finished. We have added 100 production towards our planetary project!

StringTable.Label: CreditsMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a private venture to unknown places, to find and collect valuable artifacts.

StringTable.Label: CreditsMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The treasure hunters report success from their efforts. Some unknown alien artifacts were discovered and sold on the market.

StringTable.Label: SlaveMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The thrall seekers report success from their efforts. Some new slaves have been sent back along with our money that they coincidentally were carrying.

StringTable.Label: ExoticResourcesMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By contracting with our most knowledgeable traders they claim they will bring back exotic resources.

StringTable.Label: ExoticResourcesMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The contract traders have completed their mission and provided the rare resources they found.

StringTable.Label: ResourcesMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Scavengers claim they can find some rare resources.

StringTable.Label: ResourcesMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The scavengers have completed their mission and provided the rare resources they found.

StringTable.Label: GemTrader_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a private broker who says, for the right price, he can find us exotic Harmony crystals.

StringTable.Label: GemTrader_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Gem trader was successful in trading Durantium and Promethion for some Harmony crystals.

StringTable.Label: Xylology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Fund a group of Xylologists who are investigating the evolutionary properties of rare trees. They promise to return with Aurorus seedlings.

StringTable.Label: Xylology_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Xylologists have returned with seeds that we can use to grow an Aurorus Arboretum.

StringTable.Label: Pilgrims_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Fund a group of pilgrims who wish to spread the word of our wonderful civilization to increase our influence.

StringTable.Label: Pilgrims_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The pilgrims have returned from their long journey spreading our influence far and wide. Each of our planets has increased its influence substantially.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicateMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a Hyper Silicates trader who knows the right people from whom to buy some.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicateMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Hyper Silicates for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreScavengeMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a mining group who think they can find Helios Ore on nearby dead worlds.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreScavengeMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Helios Ore for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: ArnorSpiceScavangersMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a mining group who think they can find Arnor Spice on nearby dead worlds.

StringTable.Label: ArnorSpiceScavangersMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Arnor Spice for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: HeadhunterMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An enterprising Recruiter insists, if we pay his expenses, he will head out into the galaxy and find us a new Citizen who will be willing to join our cause.

StringTable.Label: HeadhunterMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our recruiter has returned with a new citizen to join our civilization!

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a crew of hardy explorers who are willing to go out and find abandoned ships that can be repaired.

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_RewardAnomaly_Name
StringTable.String: Our Salvage Crew has found a Ship

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Salvage crew that we dispatched has found a ship, and have been able to restore to a usable condition.

StringTable.Label: BasicTradeShipMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our freighter has safely returned home, with a tidy profit!

StringTable.Label: Ability_MissileShortRange_Desc
StringTable.String: Attack an enemy fleet or base up to 3 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: Ability_MissileMediumRange_Desc
StringTable.String: Attack an enemy fleet or base up to 5 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: Ability_MissileLongRange_Desc
StringTable.String: Attack an enemy fleet or base up to 7 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: Ability_AntimatterBomb_Desc
StringTable.String: Does 12 damage to all enemy fleets, shipyards and starbases within a 5 tile radius.

StringTable.Label: Ability_HealingDrones_Desc
StringTable.String: Repairs 20 Hit Points of damage to all ships in the targeted fleet.

StringTable.Label: Ability_SpawnLoireagClone_Desc
StringTable.String: Create a duplicate of the Loireag.

StringTable.Label: Ability_TerrorStar_Beam_Desc
StringTable.String: Destroys targeted star and the planets in the system, leaving behind asteroids.

StringTable.Label: Ability_MissileVolley_Desc
StringTable.String: Attack an enemy fleet or base up to 4 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: Ability_BeamVolley_Desc
StringTable.String: Attack an enemy fleet or base up to 2 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: Ability_BuildSpaceMonsterShipyard_Desc
StringTable.String: Consume this constructor to create a Space Monster Nest at this location that will generate Monsters automatically over time.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered an ancient artifact of unknown origin. Some believe it holds the key to unlocking advanced technology, while others argue that it is a relic of our ancestors and should be preserved.[BR][BR]What should we do with this artifact?

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Opportunity_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Study the artifact for technological advancements.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Tradition_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Preserve the artifact as a symbol of our heritage.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Dec
StringTable.String: A massive migration of strange space creatures are migrating through our territory. They are creating havoc in their wake. There is a great deal of political pressure on us to eliminate these creatures but we have heard you have a fondness for these kinds of things.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Compassion_Dec
StringTable.String: We will protect the space creatures and ensure their safe passage, earning the goodwill of other compassionate factions.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Pragmatism_Name
StringTable.String: I have a better idea, we'll slaughter these creatures and extract new knowledge from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Pragmatism_Dec
StringTable.String: These creatures won't suffer too much. Probably.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Our heroic explorers have come across a Precursor artifact left behind by the so-called Arnor. We are not able to make sense of it. It was suggested to us that you might be able to figure it out. We are willing to let you look at it provided that you share what you discover with us.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the exchange knowing that it will benefit them more.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: By accepting the technology exchange, we gain +25 research units. However, they gained much more.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_String2
StringTable.String: Your team will look at the artifact and suffer an acute case of butter fingers. -3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 20 months. +25 Research for you.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Independence_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Agree to look at the artifact and then 'accidentally' destroy it.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are too busy for this.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: By declining the technology exchange and isolating ourselves, we may strain diplomatic relations but can focus on our own path. -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 20 months

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_String1
StringTable.String: You declined to help us on the artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Desc
StringTable.String: Our civilization has recently discovered an alternate energy source, which we believe will revolutionize our industries. However, the energy source requires Elerium, a rare resource in our territory. We are requesting your help to develop this energy source. In return, we will share the benefits with your civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_Name
StringTable.String: Provide Elerium for research even if we have to borrow some.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Tradition_Name
StringTable.String: We'd totally love to help with this project but we don't want to..

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Tradition_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't help us with the Elerium project.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_String1
StringTable.String: You helped us with the Elerium project.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Our home planet is suffering from a devastating natural disaster. Thousands of our people have been displaced and are seeking refuge. We ask for your assistance in this desperate time. Will you accept these refugees and help them find a new home?

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Cruelty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I have a better idea. We will pick them up and put them to work as slaves.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Cruelty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Sell them off to one of your people for 300 credits. -2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our territory contains a disputed region rich in resources. Unfortunately, a rival political faction on our world is also claiming it as their own. We are open to negotiation, but we need your support. If you back our claim, we will share the resources with you. However, if you remain neutral, we may not be able to maintain a friendly relationship.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Compassion_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Support their claim and share the resources hoping that the rival faction never gains power.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritoryCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You supported my claim to the disputed territory

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Remain neutral and let them handle the dispute.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritoryAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You remained neutral in the disputed territory

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our freighters from homeworld has been damaged by an ion storm leaving it stranded in deep space near your territory. We would like some assistance.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Compassion_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send assistance to the stranded ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShipCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You sent assistance to our stranded trade ship

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Seize the opportunity to tax their cargo.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +300 credits and -2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Dec_0X56CB
StringTable.String: We have come across some sort of device left behind by the Dread Lords. We are not quite certain what it is and wanted to see if one of your researchers would be willing to review it.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Authority_Bonus_Name_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Take the artifact and activate it.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Authority_Bonus_Dec_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Unknown but -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifactAuthority_String1_0X56CB
StringTable.String: You kept the ancient artifact for yourself

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Create a joint task force to study the artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Dec_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Some of our people have decided to try to colonize worlds without our sanction. Their ship failed and the passengers are dead and the ship has drifted near your space. We ask that you recover the ship for us. You can keep what you find on the ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Find and return the ship keeping the vast supply of goodies you find on the ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Cruelty_Bonus_Name_0X56CD
StringTable.String: I think we'll just take the ship and the items on board.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Dec_0X47AE
StringTable.String: One of our esteemed generals has dared to stage a coup against me! We have successfully thwarted his treacherous plans, but he has managed to evade our forces and has taken refuge on your homeworld. It is of the utmost importance that you cooperate in delivering this traitor back to us.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Authority_Bonus_Name_0X47AE
StringTable.String: We will find and deliver the traitor

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X57AE
StringTable.String: This really isn't our problem. He can do what he wants..

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X47AE
StringTable.String: We irritate {PLAYERFACTION:1} and the fugitive's actions are a pain for awhile. But his antics result in a comedy show.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitiveAuthority_String1_0X47AE
StringTable.String: You gave us the head of our traitor.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: We are getting reports of destruction due to pests that originated from your homeworld that are now on our world from imports. We demand you pay us 500 credits to cover the cost of repairing the environment.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Comp_Bonus_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Pay them what they want. We give them a Monsantium Deposit and we lose one.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Cruel_Bonus_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Not our issue. -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Cruel_String1_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Your bugs are damaging our world.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: The relentless tide of your people's music and culture has inundated our worlds, permeating every corner of our society. Vibrant melodies and infectious rhythms echo through our streets, distracting our citizens and disrupting the harmony of our way of life. The colorful tapestry of your traditions and customs entwines with our own, threatening to unravel the very fabric of our civilization. We demand that you intervene and quell the storm.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Authority_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We spend money and control but improve relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasionAuthority_String1_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: You tooks steps to preserve our culture.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Promote cultural exchange whereby we actively promote their culture with our people.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Compassion_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Promote cultural exchange whereby we actively promote their culture with our people. This will lower our influence generation..

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Calm_Bonus_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We'll license our music to native performers.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We improve people's moods on both sides.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:1} refugees have fled into our borders and requested asylum. They claim they have been the victims of economic oppression that made them little more than slaves.[BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have demanded their return. They make no comment about the refugees' claims, only stating that it is none of our concern.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain a Colony Ship[BR]-3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Dec
StringTable.String: We are exiling Mors Ven from our empire. We believe he is a black market trader and information dealer. However, we are unable to prove it and he is well-liked by our citizens.[BR][BR]If something happened to his shuttle while it was within your borders, that would be a fortunate accident.

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can make sure that happens.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExileLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You took care of Mors Ven

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can make the accident happen, for a fee.

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We need talented men, recruit Mors Ven.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Pirates, smugglers and worse plague this sector.[BR][BR]We are making a concerted effort to rid ourselves of these vermin, but our efforts are limited if they can simply escape into your borders.[BR][BR]We need your efforts as well, for both of our interests.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will allocate resources to stopping them.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You joined us against the Pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will allocate resources to stopping them. (lie)

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeEquality_String1
StringTable.String: You joined us against the Pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't join against the pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Dec
StringTable.String: Our citizens have become enamored of your trinkets and entertainment, leading to a new generation being born on our worlds with your ridiculous names.[BR][BR]A few temporary restrictions will help bring order, and won't have significant impact on your long-term efforts.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will accept limited restrictions for our common good.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We plan on giving your citizens more of what they want.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClashAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You are waging cultural war on us.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered an illegal cloning experiment on {PLANETNAME} that will, in short order, greatly increase our population.[BR][BR]However, the DNA was taken from citizens without their permission.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Return the DNA to its owners and let them decide.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Promote the scientist behind these experiments.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: These clones have no rights. Hatch them immediately.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Dec
StringTable.String: We have captured the famed mercenary Mirazu Ysen. Our people cry for justice in response to his history of theft and banditry. But he might be better put to another use.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Imprison the mercenary, he will pay for his crimes.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Rebuild his ship if he agrees to join you.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We could use someone like him in our government.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Dec
StringTable.String: We have uncovered a Precursor probe orbiting {PLANETNAME}. We are not sure why it was sent here or how long it has been here, but the technology is advanced.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's study this and see what we can learn.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Repair the Probe and see what it does.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Probe to the highest bidder.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: We have come across an ancient artifact near {PLANETNAME}, believed to have come from an ancient Precursor civilization. Upon activating it, it has evaluated our status and offered to aid us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlock the Nail ship in your shipyard

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convert it into an army of synthetic citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Dec
StringTable.String: During an interview, you are asked what you feel your citizens need to succeed in a time when we are exploring the galaxy and encountering alien species.[BR][BR]What would you like to promote?

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Deception_Dec
StringTable.String: This will make additional event choices available later.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Persuassion_Dec
StringTable.String: This will improve our persuassion technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Intimidation_Dec
StringTable.String: This will let us get more when we use our intimidation technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Dec
StringTable.String: We have come across an ancient terraforming device near {PLANETNAME}. Upon activating, it tells us that there was once a great war between the crafters and a powerful enemy. This device was left to help protect future civilizations from predation in the event they lost.[BR][BR]It offers us three options.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to improve the world's biomes.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to produce raw minerals in the planet's crust.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to fabricate rare resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Dec
StringTable.String: Near {PLANETNAME} we have discovered an ancient recording device that appears to have been drifting for centuries. The technology is delicate, but incredibly advanced.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's use its recordings to make our world a center of influence.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to help us increase our planet's development.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Dec
StringTable.String: We discovered a hidden outpost occupied by a single alien. He claims that he was sent to observe us, and that he has peaceful intentions.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convert the outpost to a colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite the alien to join our government.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Force the alien to tell us everything he knows.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people would like to send a beacon out into the universe, a message to the other starfaring races we will one day meet.[BR][BR]What would you like this message to be?

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send a message of peace and hope.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It is a waste of time. Put the resources toward more practical measures.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send a message telling them to prepare for their eventual enslavement.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Dec
StringTable.String: A blight has affected {PLANETNAME}. Your administrators warn that there won't be enough food for all of your citizens. The wealthy have already begun stockpiling food, and the desperate have begun raiding those stockpiles.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Share with the less fortunate. We will suffer together.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Distribute the goods to our leaders. We will need their strength to survive.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Stage a war among our people. Let them turn on each other.

StringTable.Label: Event_FamineSuccess_Dec
StringTable.String: Just as you hoped, the citizens on {PLANETNAME} have turned on each other. None of them blame you for the famine.

StringTable.Label: Event_FamineFail_Dec
StringTable.String: You plan backfires and your citizens blame you for the famine.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation has been born on {PLANETNAME}, the first that are likely to live and die on distant worlds.[BR][BR]How should we best prepare them for their future?

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our military always needs new recruits.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our most brilliant thinkers will lead us forward.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to pursue their dreams, we need more artists.

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered the remnants of one of our first space vessels. Evidence of a time when we stepped nervously beyond {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]What should we do with this piece of history?

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Put it in a museum so it may inspire future generations.

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: There is no value in nostalgia, scrap it for parts.

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Dec
StringTable.String: A new cult has begun to grow in number on {PLANETNAME}. The cult has grown wealthy by convincing rich members to make substantial donations.[BR][BR]The followers believe that we were given life by an alien species, and they predict that these creators will soon return to lead us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They offer a unique insight, invite their leader to join us.

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unique voices should be protected, not constrained.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Dec
StringTable.String: A group has begun to protest the resources that are being spent exploring the galaxy. They argue that those resources are better spent improving the lives of those on {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to present their opinions before the budget committee.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They can protest, but arrest anyone who goes beyond that.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: If they want to improve the planet, put them to work doing exactly that.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Dec
StringTable.String: A biographer is interviewing you so that he can write a book about your rise to power. He asks what motivated you to lead the drive from your homeworld and into the unknown reaches of space.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have achieved greatness, and now it is our responsibility to share that with the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have only seen a tiny fraction of what the universe offers. So much more awaits.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I am seeking new worlds to conquer.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Dec
StringTable.String: A museum is opening a display about your life. They would like to know what you feel your greatest accomplishment has been.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I alone have done nothing. Together, we have done everything.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: My greatest accomplishment is yet to come.

StringTable.Label: Event_DigDeep_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic advisors on {PLANETNAME} discovered rare resources under the planet's most fertile region. They want permission to excavate the land to reach these resources.[BR][BR]They promise to set up a small exhibit for all the species they exterminate.

StringTable.Label: Event_DigDeep_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invest in improving the fertile region instead.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Dec
StringTable.String: An attempt to create an improved antibiotic has instead produced a bacteria that is immune to our treatments. It has escaped the lab and your scientists warn that it is spreading on {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]It can be fatal to infants and the elderly.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Quarantine the sick, by force if need be.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Prioritize health care and make sure the infected get treatment.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Warn the citizens and allow them to respond as they want.

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a growing dislike for the {PLAYERFACTION:1} among our people. The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have requested that we attempt to curb this disapproval by releasing a public statement supporting them.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will issue a statement of support

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Condemn the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for attempting to influence your people.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship of unknown origin has appeared on our borders. It has weaponry so advanced our scanners are unable to classify it. We receive one message from it: pay up or those weapons will be turned against us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will not bend to threats.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Paying him off is the most reasonable option.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Offer to build him an even better ship if he joins us.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Dec
StringTable.String: Reports are coming in from multiple sources of increased pirate activity. Our people demand that we do something to keep our worlds safe.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Recruit a military advisor to counter the threat.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Warn our citizens of the threat, they may help.

StringTable.Label: Event_RecruitmentDrive_Dec
StringTable.String: A rush of excitement in our space program has spurred a lot of new candidates applying for critical positions. We should take advantage of this situation while it lasts.

StringTable.Label: Event_RecruitmentDrive_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should take advantage of this

StringTable.Label: Event_ElectionWarning_Dec
StringTable.String: An election to reform our government will happen in five weeks. It will be based on the [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] of our citizens.[BR][BR]Anything we can do to improve our citizen's Approval will help our reform pass. Or we could simply adjust the results to ensure the measure passes.[BR][BR]What would you like to do?

StringTable.Label: Event_ElectionWarning_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will let the results speak for themselves.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Dec
StringTable.String: A covert message is sent to all telepaths in the empire, they are to begin an exhausting and costly ritual to amplify their power. As they concentrate, their minds begin to merge, forming a collective consciousness that reaches out across the vast expanse of space. They search for any sentient beings on {PLANETNAME} and begin to probe their mind. Their psychic connection remains steadfast, enabling them to subtly implant thoughts and manipulate their targets without detection, at least for the present.[BR]What should we make the citizens of {PLANETNAME} believe?

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them they are on fire.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Liberty_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} slips into chaos as citizen after citizen falls into an uncontrollable panic. They scream about burning alive and beg those around to extinguish the flames; however, none falling to this mass delusion are on fire. Only a slim handful are broken of their illusion after intense counseling. Secretly officials are beginning to suspect a sort of mind-control attack. Those managing the crisis report it'll take five months for the society of {PLANETNAME} to fully recover.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them believe that every conversation is argument to be won.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Mod_Equality_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: The crisis on {PLANETNAME} begins with a few arguments. Quickly all tempers are boiling over. Screaming matches are inescapable, their pervasiveness impacting everyone across {PLANETNAME}. Experts in conflict resolution are rushed in to aid. The work is slow at first as none of the arguments have any substance. Sealed reports indicate the source of the episode to be a telepathic attack. Without genuine grievances, it takes a lot of time to end fights. Sources indicate it will take ten months to resolve the crisis on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them hear an annoying beep they cannot find the source of.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Mod_Authority_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: The citizens of {PLANETNAME} report an incessant beeping en masse. The disturbance seems to have developed overnight. Medical experts on the colony (themselves suffering the annoyance) are confounded. Experts are transported to {PLANETNAME}, but all their studies are inconclusive. The only explanation that makes sense is a psychological attack through telepathy. Based on the reported rate of decay of the sound, it will take 15 months for the crisis to resolve itself on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Dec
StringTable.String: A covert message is sent to all telepaths in the empire, they are to begin an exhausting and costly ritual to amplify their power.
