As they concentrate, their minds begin to merge, forming a collective consciousness that reaches out across the vast expanse of space.[BR]They search for any sentient beings on {PLANETNAME} and begin to probe their mind. Their psychic connection remains steadfast, enabling them to subtly implant thoughts and manipulate their targets without detection, at least for the present.[BR]What should we make the citizens of {PLANETNAME} believe?

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them fall in love at first sight.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them believe that every meal is the best they ever had.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them to celebrate every single achievement. No matter how small.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov1Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to an Imperial government by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Imperial governments are more efficient and boost our [HS=HS_PolicySlot]Policy Slots[/HS] and [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS], as well as expanding our [HS=HS_ShipRange]Ship Range[/HS] considerably.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov2Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to a Republic government by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Republic governments are more efficient and boost our [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] and [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS] substantially.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov3Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to a Federation by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Federations are the envy of other civilizations and boost our [HS=HS_influence]Influence[/HS] considerably.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernmentUpgradeFail_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has voted against reforming the government to {WANTEDGOVERNMENTNAME:1}. Those in favor only made up {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}% of the vote.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, is displeased with our interference and is threatening to join the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]They claim we interfere with their world, and there should be more freedom to govern themselves.[BR][BR]Our advisors claim that doing so will increase [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernorLiberty_String2
StringTable.String: You allow me to govern as I want

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernor_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Bribe the Governor to change his mind.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is speaking openly about our incompetence. Our other leaders have already begun to take notice, and it is souring their opinion of us.[BR][BR]Some of our more soft-hearted advisors suggest that this is a normal part of a complex society, while others recommend that we take firm action against the governor and the soft-hearted advisors.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow him to speak his mind.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Some time in a dungeon should fix this.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is widely believed to be favoring personal friends at the expense of their world's citizens.[BR][BR]Our advisors have investigated the accusations and determined that they are false, and {GOVERNORNAME} hasn't done anything wrong.[BR][BR]Still, there is a loud public outcry for us to at least chastise the governor in some manner, or we will seem to be complicit in the supposed corruption.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The governor has done nothing wrong and we will support them.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Condemn the governor. That's the price of politics.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, warns that their planet is under cultural assault by the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]{FOREIGNINFLUENCER} influence has begun to show up in local media, games and fashion, especially among younger citizens.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} is requesting a grant to counter this threat.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will fund a cultural celebration on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Impose an import tax on foreign goods.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, has done a poor job of setting up a justice system on their planet.[BR][BR]Instead of dealing with it locally, they are requesting our capital's lawmakers deal with the problem.[BR][BR]It is disappointing that such measures are needed to deal with one governor's incompetence, but we have little choice if we don't want [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] to grow on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Investigate signs of crime and corruption, starting with the inept governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is warning of a potential climate disaster on their planet. Deep fissures have begun to release immense amounts of heat and particles into the atmosphere.[BR][BR]Without immediate action it could cause damage to {PLANETNAME}. But it would require significant resources to address.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Redirect local manufacturing to resolve the issue.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have wronged {GOVERNORNAME} often encounter significant bad luck, some going missing entirely. At first these were just rumors, but those rumors have created fear.[BR][BR]When questioned about it, {GOVERNORNAME} quietly denies any involvement, only offering that bad things happen to bad people.[BR][BR]The only piece of evidence is {GOVERNORNAME}'s notebook, where many of those who ran into misfortune are listed and crossed off.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It would be foolish to cross {GOVERNORNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Assign security to those on {GOVERNORNAME}'s list and monitor them closely.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your name has been added to {GOVERNORNAME}'s list.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Dec
StringTable.String: A relic which has deep symbolic meaning among our people has been missing for decades.[BR][BR]It was recently discovered to be held by one of your leaders, {GOVERNORNAME}.[BR][BR]How they acquired it is irrelevant. We have already asked them to return it and offered to purchase it from them. They have refused.[BR][BR]We are counting on you to do the right thing and hand it over to us.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has made their choice, and I stand behind it.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon]Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]-3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBroochLiberty_String2
StringTable.String: You refused to return our relic

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make sure the brooch is turned over to you.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] -20 Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]+1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has incurred a significant debt for the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Your name was used as collateral, and it's certainly an insignificant sum to you.[BR][BR]I trust you will pay this debt and keep {GOVERNORNAME} out of harm's way.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We cannot afford it. Do as you must to {GOVERNORNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] -10 Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] -1 Resolve for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]-1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: No. And any aggression towards {GOVERNORNAME} will be met with war.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] +5 Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]-8 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] +10 Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]+1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}'s family has a long tradition of arranged marriages, though they themselves are opposed to it, and have previously fled from the marriage their family set up.[BR][BR]However, now a new suitor has been selected, and while the family isn't asking for you to force {GOVERNORNAME} to do anything, they do wish for you to intercede on their behalf, talking to {GOVERNORNAME} about being open to the idea.[BR][BR]The family offers a small token if you accept this request.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I won't have any part of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't meddle in my life

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will speak to {GOVERNORNAME} about it.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageSuccess_Dec
StringTable.String: The family is furious that you would disrupt their plans for an arranged marriage. To their shock, {GOVERNORNAME} accepts your proposal.[BR][BR]The story of your marriage warms the hearts of your people, and even other civilizations send gifts and best wishes.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageFail_Dec
StringTable.String: The family is furious that you would disrupt their plans for an arranged marriage. But it is nothing compared to {GOVERNORNAME}'s shock and disappointment.[BR][BR]The rejection is immediate, and a little hurtful.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageFail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Things are going to be awkward for a while.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Dec
StringTable.String: Rumors are spreading on {PLANETNAME} of a strange cult. There are numerous reports of people disappearing from hospitals, and evidence points to involvement by the planet's governor, {GOVERNORNAME}.[BR][BR]Interrogating {GOVERNORNAME} uncovers the truth. A device was being used to cure the sick, at the cost of damage to {GOVERNORNAME}'s body. Painful scars are left by the device that impair movement and control.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: You cannot sacrifice the world's governor for the least of its citizens. Take the device.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This sacrifice is noble, but minimize it to keep {GOVERNORNAME} safe.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the device to transfer the scars from {GOVERNORNAME} to you.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] +25 Loyalty for {GOVERNORNAME}[BR]{GOVERNORNAME} is healed[BR]You become Scarred

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} makes frequent requests of the government. Better housing, improved public education, free health care, and on and on.[BR][BR]Today it is about clean water. This is not an issue for most of our citizens but {GOVERNORNAME} argues that millions of our most vulnerable lack access to safe water.[BR][BR]Your advisors are tired of listening to the complaining and argue that the process will be both expensive and provide little tangible value to our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Increase regulations on our planets to make sure the water is safe everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We don't have time for these trivial requests.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Dec
StringTable.String: It isn't unusual to get incessant requests from {GOVERNORNAME}, but this one is extreme.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} argues that {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens are suffering and receiving inadequate resources and medical attention.[BR][BR]Your advisors are stunned by the suggestion that we would dedicate some of our rare resources to another civilization, and beg you to stop {GOVERNORNAME}'s madness.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Provide resources to {PLAYERFACTION:1} to prevent their suffering.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We don't have time for these trivial requests.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion3_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}'s advocacy for the least of our citizens is well known. As is our support for these requests.[BR][BR]Though the aide received little direct benefit, our citizens have not forgotten our kindness and throw a celebration in {GOVERNORNAME}'s honor.[BR][BR]Some of them even remember our role in providing this help.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion3_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are judged by how we treat the least of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_RenegadeGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, has discovered a cache of Precursor technology. Unfortunately, rather than share it, they have used it to negotiate a high ranking position in the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]Because of his act of treason, we have lost {PLANETNAME} and this hidden cache.

StringTable.Label: Event_RenegadeGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Their treason won't be quickly forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Event_LoyalGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, is so enamored with your leadership that a statue of you has been erected on their world.[BR][BR]Though the statue provides little practical benefit, the governor's devotion could be a very useful commodity.

StringTable.Label: Event_LoyalGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make use of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorFundRaiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Your fame on {PLANETNAME} has caused the governor, {GOVERNORNAME}, to hold a massive fundraiser in your honor.[BR][BR]The event was a success and greatly contributed to our public coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorFundRaiser_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make use of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} has been falsely accusing the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for all the issues on their world. From crime to disease their rhetoric has begun to galvanize the anger on the world in a way that may be beneficial in the short term, but dangerous in diplomatic relations.[BR][BR]It has now come to a crossroads where the {PLAYERFACTION:1} expects you to denounce the hate speech, but this is likely to turn the anger against us.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Support the Governor. We can use this opportunity.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] Loyalty from {GOVERNORNAME} is increased[BR]-2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Denounce the Governor, such rhetoric is dangerous.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Loyalty_Icon] Loyaly from {GOVERNORNAME} is reduced[BR]+2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} is claiming that we have grown soft by a long period without war. They claim that our failure to move against weaker enemies undermines our future and ability to become a dominant power in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Have a military parade to appease the Governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Some time in a dungeon will show the Governor that we are not soft.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Dec
StringTable.String: Year ago {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} suffered an accident and was saved by the use of cybernetic implants. Though few object to using the technology to save lives {GOVERNORNAME} found a precursor artifact they are planning to tie into their cybernetics and could potentially provide nearly perfect memory and reduce the need for sleep to a few minutes a day.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the procedure, this future is unavoidable.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Outlaw the procedure and take the precursor resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} is unquestioningly brilliant, but is so obsessed with their research that they have failed to adequately manage {PLANETNAME}. Our advisors are requesting that we force them to focus on their world, but {GOVERNORNAME} claims to be close to a breakthrough.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to pursue their studies.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Force them to focus on their job.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} the governor of {PLANETNAME} is the richest citizen on their planet. Having exploited so much wealth from their world they are now eyeing our coffers. Our advisors warn against feeding their greed, but it is a small price to pay for their loyalty.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Provide the modest gift they are requesting.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Their wealth is better used in our coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scandal_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} the governor of {PLANETNAME} is renown for their integrity and ethics. But an illicit romance has been discovered in their personal life, and {GOVERNORNAME} has sent a message to us letting us know that they plan to publicly accept responsibility for it, no matter the consequences.[BR][BR]Our advisors warn that the criminal extorting {GOVERNORNAME} will never be believed and has no real proof and suggest {GOVERNORNAME} deny the affair instead.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Dec
StringTable.String: A fire spread through the slums of {PLANETNAME} and hundreds of our citizens were killed. An investigation confirms that safety guidelines were skipped while building the housing. {GOVERNORNAME} claims that it was a tragedy, but the regulations would have made it to expensive and left millions without homes. As evidence of the money saved they are willing to make a contribution to our governmental coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Thank the governor for the contribution and look the other way.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Insist that all housing be brought up to standards.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFireEquality_String2
StringTable.String: You forced your polices on me.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheDinnerParty_Dec
StringTable.String: A lavish diplomatic dinner was held on {PLANETNAME}. What should have been a minor event has become a diplomatic incident because of the rude behavior of {GOVERNORNAME}. Many loud comment were made about the inferiority of other species that offended the {PLAYERFACTION:1} delegate.[BR][BR]Now, the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are demanding a public apology and threatening to ban all future diplomatic events if they don't get it.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheDinnerParty_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Apologize for our governor's inappropriate behavior.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, has come forward to tell us that our years at war are having an effect on the citizens of their world. Depression is on the rise, especially among the young. They ask that we end our wars quickly and return to a period of peace and posterity.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Launch a media campaign to communicate the virtues of the war.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Do nothing. War is costly to everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheMissionaries_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has captured an illegal group of {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens on {PLANETNAME}. They claim to be religious missionaries but had a small stockpile of weapons in their belongings which they say were for defense.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} has imprisoned them and has requested permission to begin interrogating them. {PLAYERFACTION:1} claims that they are innocent and demands that they be released immediately.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Traitors within our own colonization program have been secretly planning against us for months. They found and kept secret a high quality world and took some of your most hated rivals and settled it.[BR][BR]They have no interest in relations with us but rather intend to actually bring down our government if they can. We have no choice but to go to war with them.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: There is now a nearby new civilization made up of our own people seeking our destruction.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_LeaderDesc
StringTable.String: The ambitious and malevolent Count Kurzko seeks your personal destruction.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfWaking_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nocturnal cycle continues as the Season of Waking begins. The Season of Waking is associated with natural light and bright days and relates to physical labor and social gatherings. Celebrations heralding the seasonal shift often involve extravagant dinners and raucous dances.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] are boosted for every colony during the Season of Waking. It's best to leverage the new focus to complete more complex constructions and raise new citizens during this time.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfDreaming_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nocturnal cycle continues as the Season of Dreaming begins. During the Season of Dreaming, respect is held for the dimmer lights of life -encompassing everything from the moon and magma to lightbulbs and flares. The reserved season is marked with art shows, the start of the academic calendar, and personal growth.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] are boosted for every colony during the Season of Dreaming. It's best to leverage the new focus to expand borders, annex territory, and research more complex technologies.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfWaking_Response_Dec
StringTable.String: Every Colony recieves a boost to [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfDreaming_Response_Dec
StringTable.String: Every Colony recieves a boost to [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Dec
StringTable.String: The residents of {PLANETNAME} have discovered local fauna that when used, increases their intelligence sharply.[BR][BR]However, it is also highly addictive and results in reckless behavior which leads to crime.[BR][BR]What do you think we should do about it?

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Outlawing the plant will result in making people very unhappy for awhile.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Encourage its use. We will deal with the crime later.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research on this planet will benefit from this but we will also see a rise in crime.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Dec
StringTable.String: The inhabitants of {PLANETNAME} have come across a primitive sentient species. They possess incredible strength and are exceedingly trusting. How should we proceed?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: So the planet came with slaves? Excellent.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Enslaving this species will lead to a significant increase in planetary output but at a moral cost.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Leave them in peace and learn from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: By respecting their sovereignty and peaceful nature, we improve our own societal values and approval.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Name
StringTable.String: A world under Siege by Storms

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is enshrouded in fierce tempests that light up its skies with electric brilliance.[BR][BR]Whirlwinds, charged with raw cosmic energy, disrupt both nature and the colony's daily life. Biodomes tremble, and distress signals pierce through the storm's roar.[BR][BR]The settlers urgently seek guidance. How shall we protect them from this unyielding planetary wrath?

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This will protect the citizens from the ravages of the storms, but the infrastructure will come with increased planetary maintenance costs.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: I really wish I could help. But I just don't want to.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: While this will save on infrastructure costs, the people will be displeased by the continued destruction and danger.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Dec
StringTable.String: The planet {PLANETNAME} is ablaze. Not with the radiance of its sun, but with the fires of civil strife.[BR][BR]The colonists, torn apart by old feuds and new animosities, skirmish beneath alien skies.[BR][BR]The unsettled atmosphere grows thick with tension, while reports of skirmishes and civil unrest flood the communication channels.[BR][BR]Do we intervene to restore order, or let them murder each other until it the problem solves itself?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Establishing order will certainly quell the turmoil, but the heavy hand of law might stifle the colony's spirit.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Entrusting the colonists to find their own harmony could either lead to unity or deepen the rifts.

StringTable.Label: Event_CosmicEye_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cosmic eye has gazed upon the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Although no new technolgies were observed, we have gathered some insights on reseach methods different from our own.

StringTable.Label: Event_CosmicEye_NoPlanets_Dec
StringTable.String: No inhabited celestial bodies are here. Use caution when gazing into the abyss, some say it gazes back.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Archeology_Dec
StringTable.String: Our species are natural '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]archeologists[/COLOR]'. We can make use of this ability to get far more benefit from any asteroids we are able to mine.

StringTable.Label: Policy_BanDissent_Dec
StringTable.String: We are stronger when we are united in purpose, and therefore speaking against our government weakens us and is effectively treason.

StringTable.Label: Policy_BlockEmbassies_Dec
StringTable.String: Diplomacy is the tool of the weak to bind the strong. We will speak directly, and with our military if needed.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]We can not assign or accept diplomats[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_Bureaucracy_Dec
StringTable.String: They laugh at our byzantine laws, and they may make simple tasks more complex. But when the greatest logistical challenges come, our administration is ready.

StringTable.Label: Policy_SecretPolice_Dec
StringTable.String: With our empire now stretching across the stars, there's many dark corners we can disappear troublemakers to...

StringTable.Label: Policy_CoercedColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we are to colonize the galaxy we will need to inspire our citizens. This can be done through propaganda, incentives, or force. Doubles population growth.

StringTable.Label: Policy_GreatExpansion_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is an amazing opportunity and many would be entrepreneurs on our home world are likely to sign up to leave if we can compensate them for their setup costs.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ReproductiveImperative_Dec
StringTable.String: Our species has never had a problem replacing its numbers. [BR][BR]However, recent events have made it clear that we need to greatly increase our growth.

StringTable.Label: Policy_WithoutSlumber_Dec
StringTable.String: We do not require sleep like organic species, we rest for balance and pleasure. But, if our civilization requires it, this pleasure can be ignored.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Conscription_Dec
StringTable.String: We stand, or fall, together. And from each is excepted a unity of purpose and service.

StringTable.Label: Policy_CaveOfEchoes_Dec
StringTable.String: Our homeworld is where our sentience was born. This most sacred place must be maintained for future generations.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Influence bonus is only applied to the Homeworld.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_HeartOfTheEmpire_Dec
StringTable.String: Our homeworld is the core of our civilization, and the pinnacle of who we are as a people.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Influence and Income are only applied to the Homeworld.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_ReducedRegulations_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe we can increase our tax revenue if we reduce the number of regulations our citizens must adhere to.

StringTable.Label: Policy_CulturalValues_Dec
StringTable.String: If we conquer the galaxy but lose our identity in the process we have been defeated, if only by ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Policy_EmergencyCoalition_Dec
StringTable.String: War often calls for all of us to sacrifice for the common good.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Empathy_Dec
StringTable.String: We are an '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]empathic[/COLOR]' people. Our civilization must work together more than ever to thrive in this next stage of our history. By using our empathic ability actively we can increase our happiness greatly.

StringTable.Label: Policy_EndlessFeast_Dec
StringTable.String: Our '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]ravenous[/COLOR]' nature makes us appreciate a good meal. To that end, we will be harvesting life from other planets for consumption at home.

StringTable.Label: Policy_XenoHarvesting_Dec
StringTable.String: Our '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]unrelenting[/COLOR]' nature shows us the truth that other species exist only as either our food or to provide wealth. This policy means that we will always seek to maximize the wealth we are able to extract from the universe to our homeworld

StringTable.Label: Policy_EnvironmentalExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: We are in a period of rapid interstellar expansion. The expense requires we take unusual measures to increase our wealth. This policy will open up public lands to extreme mining techniques to generate additional wealth.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Eugenics_Dec
StringTable.String: Forced sterilization of our inferior members will lead to unprecedented advancement of our species with each generation.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ExperimentalDrives_Dec
StringTable.String: The safety thresholds of our engines are well below their actual capability. We can unlock their potential if we are okay with occasional side effects.

StringTable.Label: Policy_DefensiveMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing on basic defenses we limit the reach of our explorers, but significantly limit their risk.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ExtremeAutomation_Dec
StringTable.String: So-called [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]'Synthetic'[/COLOR] species such as ourselves have the ability to work together in ways that fleshlings cannot. This comes at a cost, even for us, but we can greatly increase our production as a result.

StringTable.Label: Policy_FastExploration_Dec
StringTable.String: As natural '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]explorers[/COLOR]', we have the ability to sacrifice the quality of our ships, to get a bit more performance out of the engines.

StringTable.Label: Policy_FleetBuildUp_Dec
StringTable.String: There is little use in accumulated assets if we lack the ability to defend them.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ForeignDumping_Dec
StringTable.String: We have found the perfect solution to our polluted worlds, secretly dumping our toxic waste on other planets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spreads 10% Pollution through trade routes[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_FreeHousing_Dec
StringTable.String: The least among us struggle to find shelter. By providing minimum housing to all of our citizens we make sure that they have a foundation to build upon.

StringTable.Label: Policy_FreeMedia_Dec
StringTable.String: The cornerstone of a successful civilization is a powerful media that can speak without fear of reprisal.

StringTable.Label: Policy_FreeTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Embargoes, subsidies and taxes are the enemy of economic growth. By allowing open trade between civilizations we all prosper.

StringTable.Label: Policy_GeneticManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our capabilities are not determined by chance, but by intent.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Intelligence for all Citizens and Leaders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_GeniusGrants_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no more rewarding investment than in our brightest minds. Gives every core world an additional research point.

StringTable.Label: Policy_GroveGrowth_Dec
StringTable.String: Our [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]spores[/COLOR] can be used to increase the food production on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Policy_HeritageProtection_Dec
StringTable.String: We were first in this galaxy and should preserve our ways and our home eternal. We will use this to influence other civilizations.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Influence bonus is only applied to the Homeworld[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_HullReinforcing_Dec
StringTable.String: With the dangers of space and our own familiarity with exotic materials we can ensure that our ships are more robust than others.

StringTable.Label: Policy_InfrastructureSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Distributing our infrastructure is an expensive process but dramatically helps remote worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Manufacturing bonus is not applied to the Homeworld[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_Brainstorming_Dec
StringTable.String: We are an '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]inspired[/COLOR]', species. To that end, we can seek out the best and brightest of our people and see what amazing ideas they might have to spur technological progress.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Research bonus is only applied to the Homeworld[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_IPTheft_Dec
StringTable.String: Our [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]resourceful[/COLOR] nature can be used to aggressively steal the bits of research from other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Laissez faire_Dec
StringTable.String: Our [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]wealthy[/COLOR] civilization will do better if we eliminate remaining social programs and regulation.

StringTable.Label: Policy_LookTheOtherWay_Dec
StringTable.String: What happens in the dark corners of our empire is none of our business.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Crime is spread through Trade Routes[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Policy_MandatoryService_Dec
StringTable.String: Defense of our worlds must be the first priority of our government, or no other priority matters. With this measure each of our planets receive 3 free guardian fighters

StringTable.Label: Policy_MilitaryStimulus_Dec
StringTable.String: We must subsidize our Shipyards with more manufacturing help.

StringTable.Label: Policy_OpenImmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: If we are to survive we must appeal not only to our citizens, but to those outside of our empire.

StringTable.Label: Policy_PlanetaryStimulus_Dec
StringTable.String: What value is wealth if it doesn't improve the life of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Policy_UnderwaterHomes_Dec
StringTable.String: We are not restricted to the land. The ocean was our home, and we can live there still.

StringTable.Label: Policy_SecurityLights_Dec
StringTable.String: There are simple steps that can be taken to keep our citizens safe. The first of these is adequate lighting in all areas of our cities.

StringTable.Label: Policy_PoliceState_Dec
StringTable.String: If our citizens want the government to be accountable for their condition, they must give the government the tools to control that condition.

StringTable.Label: Policy_PopulationBoom_Dec
StringTable.String: Our '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]fertile[/COLOR]' nature can be leveraged to increase our population quickly. We are going to need all the people we can get to populate the universe.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Professionalism_Dec
StringTable.String: We are a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]loyal[/COLOR] people. This has allowed for our officers to form bonds that build trust without fear of cynical ambition. We can leverage this to improve the performance of our officer corps.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ProtectThePlanet_Dec
StringTable.String: The planet came before us, and will exist after. How long we remain upon it will depend on if we are a good caretaker.

StringTable.Label: Policy_PrototypeDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Nothing is more important than the lives of those brave enough to lead our charge into space. We should do everything in our power to protect them.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Rationing_Dec
StringTable.String: Austerity measures are required to survive this age, or else we die together. Though this measure will keep our people from starving, it will not make them happy.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ResearchGrants_Dec
StringTable.String: Education is the torch that will lead us into the next age, and resolve the problems we find there.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ShipSpecifications_Dec
StringTable.String: The rush to create will always result in an inferior product. Time and craftsmanship will ensure the quality of our ships is second to none.

StringTable.Label: Policy_ShoddyConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We are a '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]prolific[/COLOR]' civilization and are willing to do what needs to be done to get structures built as quickly as possible. Reduces improvement construction cost but increases upkeep.

StringTable.Label: Policy_SingularPurpose_Dec
StringTable.String: Our nature is '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]unrelenting[/COLOR]' due to our ability to work together with singular purpose. With a little effort, we can increase our control over our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Policy_SlaveLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: Why pay ten men to do a job when you can pay one to beat the other nine if they don't work?

StringTable.Label: Policy_Telenavigation_Dec
StringTable.String: We are a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]manufactured[/COLOR] species that can create ships with sentient but [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]synthetic[/COLOR] pilots that can withstand forces that would crush the soft, squishy fleshlings. This policy will allow our ships to travel faster.

StringTable.Label: Policy_UniversalHealthCare_Dec
StringTable.String: Money, research and production all rely on a healthy population to build and support. Without it we are building a house of cards.

StringTable.Label: Policy_UnregulatedCorporations_Dec
StringTable.String: Corporations may be more effective without regulations limiting their growth. But, our advisors warn that regulations are critical to avoid disastrous events.

StringTable.Label: Policy_UnregulatedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: This age will be led by those with the most advanced technology. But our advisors warn that regulations are critical to avoid disastrous consequences.

StringTable.Label: Policy_UrbanPlanning_Dec
StringTable.String: By including adequate space for all needs we can provide for our citizens in a way that empty rhetoric won't.

StringTable.Label: Policy_Vision_Dec
StringTable.String: Our species are very good at '[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]starfaring[/COLOR]'. With a little extra spending, we can greatly increase our sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Policy_TaxExemptions_Dec
StringTable.String: Our elite argue that the government makes poor use of their money. By providing a wide range of tax exemptions their businesses can grow, even if the public coffers don't.

StringTable.Label: Policy_WealthTax_Dec
StringTable.String: Our wealthiest citizens have benefited the most from our society. They should be taxed not only on their profit, but annually on any wealth they hold.

StringTable.Label: Policy_YouAreJustANumber_Dec
StringTable.String: Personal expression is a distracting and ultimately toxic influence on our society. Also, it's weird. If we condemn it we can focus our citizens on more productive pursuits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a nursery rhyme that your people have passed down for eons - "The Shard of the Mithrilar". A story about a relic of creation, too powerful to leave in the care of any one nation, so it was placed amongst the stars. Assumed a silly little tale by most, one of your scientists thinks he's seen clues that the Shard actually exists.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will find it, and the Shard will no longer be legend.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Somewhere in the galaxy, a shard of the Mithrilar has revealed itself. An ancient device, it would be an unimaginable weapon if it fell into the wrong hands. We must find the world this dark relic is on, penetrate its defenses, and destroy the shard before it destroys all.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Precursor Origins technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find and Claim 'The Shard of the Mithrilar'

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Dec
StringTable.String: In the moment of victory, as the Shard begins to fade from view, we can sense that it truly lies in a reality beyond this one. We can't destroy it, only send it away. That is, if we haven't changed our minds.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send the Shard away. We do not want this power.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The Shard can stay, if we alone can wield it. We will use it responsibly.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Dec
StringTable.String: The resources of the galaxy grow sparse. Fear of a simmering galactic conflict - 'The Everwar' - has taken hold. If we wait too long, war will erupt and we will be at the mercy of those who strike first.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: War is Declared on all other civilizations for 90 Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The resources of the galaxy grow sparse. Fear of a simmering galactic conflict - 'The Everwar' - has taken hold. If we wait too long, war will erupt and we will be at the mercy of those who strike first.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] At war for at least 20 Months and have the Universal Translator technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 25 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The Everwar has reached its conclusion, and although it has no winners, our people at least are not among its losers. In the aftermath, our people look to you to answer if we have learned anything from this madness.[BR][BR]What have we learned?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We've learned that war suits us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have learned we desire peace above all else.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Dec
StringTable.String: There has been a time in the advancement of every species when the universe turns against them. The galaxy is littered with the remains of empires that failed the test.[BR][BR]This time has come for us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All civilizations declare war on us for 88 Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Lies spread by our enemies, jealousy of our growing power and in some cases justified anger at our actions has caused the universe to declare a common enemy, us. We must survive.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] You must have the Universal Translator technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 70 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Dec
StringTable.String: We have survived the coalition of our enemies. They may be willing to make new alliances now, but they will not easily forget the war.[BR][BR]We won't forget the war either. What did we learn from it?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: That our survival requires a strong military.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They wars are won in the lab, not the battlefield.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Dec
StringTable.String: Something has happened to the population of spacefaring beasts in the galaxy. Their numbers have begun increasing at a rate never before seen. There doesn't appear to be anything we can do to stop this. We must simply ride it out.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is a dark time, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Space Monster Shipyards will produce hordes of spawn for 100 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Something has happened to the population of spacefaring beasts in the galaxy. Their numbers have begun increasing at a rate never before seen. There doesn't appear to be anything we can do to stop this. We must simply ride it out.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] You must be at peace for at least 50 Months.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The space faring beasts in the region have returned to their normal state of reproductive activity, and none too soon. Given the curiously rapid manner in which their carcasses decay, our scientists now have but a brief window to study the phenomena. How should we direct their research goals?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Dec
StringTable.String: A new disease of great destructive potential has emerged, spreading rapidly across the galaxy. Appearing to primarily target Organic and Aquatic species, the new disease, the Penultipox, threatens to kill trillions. Unless a cure can be found.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All organic and aquatic lifeforms will suffer penalties until a cure is found. (Build Wonder)

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: A new disease of great destructive potential has emerged, spreading rapidly across the galaxy. Appearing to primarily target Organic and Aquatic species, the new disease, the Penultipox, threatens to kill trillions. Unless a cure can be found.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Xeno Biology technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Build a wonder to find a cure or trade from someone else who has.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have done it, having discovered not only a safe and effective vaccination for the Penultipox, but also useful therapeutic treatments to manage it in place. Our people, at last, are safe. The question is: are any others?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Dec
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol has been discovered, marking the start of a terrible new chapter in the galaxy's story. This twisted relic grants great power to its holder, power which increases over time. They will become the ultimate power in the universe - if no-one stops them first.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Ooooh! I LOVE power beyond imagination!

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol has been discovered, marking the start of a terrible new chapter in the galaxy's story. This twisted relic grants great power to its holder, power which increases over time. They will become the ultimate power in the universe - if no-one stops them first.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName2
StringTable.String: Use the Artifact to open a Pocket Universe

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Your sensors pick up something...strange. A signature unlike anything seen in your lifetime. Your scientists look it over and, with a dreadful realization, turn to you with a nod: this is the Key to the Pocket Universe.[BR][BR]The Artifact that has the power to unlock unlimited power - and unlimited destruction. And it's yours.[BR][BR]Our advisors strongly caution against using the artifact until we are ready, and certainly no where near our core worlds. Who knows what is waiting on the other side of a dimensional rift ready to sweep in and exterminate us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Your sensors detect a strange signature, unlike anything seen before. Scientists confirm, it's the Key to the Pocket Universe, an artifact with unlimited power and potential for destruction. Advisors caution against using it until ready, and away from core worlds, due to unknown threats.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_OpenedPocketUniverse_Dec
StringTable.String: The Pocket Universe has opened, and out pour a bunch of Dreadlords. You'll need to find the Orb of Draginol, which has hidden itself on a world of one of the less advanced civilizations. Seek it out!

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Dec
StringTable.String: We have done it, and with our victory over its owner, the Orb of Draginol disappears again. As a token of respect, or perhaps to mark us as the next galactic target, the Orb offers us a gift of Dreadlord technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should begin investigating this technology right away.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will take nothing. We want no part of this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Dec
StringTable.String: The mark of an advanced civilization is in the cultural wonders it creates. Wonders like the Altarian Tower of Stars and the Onyx Hive's Pit of Echoes.[BR][BR]If we are to establish ourselves as the dominant galactic civilization we must construct a marvel the galaxy has never seen.[BR][BR]But once we make our plans known, know that other civilizations will rush to complete this marvel as well. And there is no fame in finishing second.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: If we are to establish ourselves as the dominant galactic civilization we must construct a marvel the galaxy has never seen.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 3 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 20 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Hall of Unity improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Dec
StringTable.String: This perfect model of the galaxy is wonderous to behold. The astrolab even changes over time and can display the state of galaxy thousands of years in the past or the future with perfect precision.[BR][BR]Although many thought the the future stellar events would be the most interesting, it is the past and the movements of the precursors it implies that excite our scientists the most.[BR][BR]They believe it will be a treasure map to lost precursor vaults. And much like other treasure maps, only valuable to the first person to complete it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Astrolab, a perfect model of the galaxy, displays past and future states with precision. Scientists are excited by precursor movements, believing it to be a treasure map to lost vaults, valuable only to the first to complete it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: This perfect model of the galaxy is wonderous to behold. The astrolab even changes over time and can display the state of galaxy thousands of years in the past or the future with perfect precision.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 5 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Astrolab of the Arnor improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Dec
StringTable.String: Access to infinite storage allows us to create a museum of all media and information which benefits both tourists and our scientists.[BR][BR]Our citizens are eager to see our dream become reality. But allowing open access to our knowledge will benefit other civilizations. It will grant them access to all of our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Access to infinite storage allows us to create a museum of all media and information. Beware, this will give our technology to all other civilizations.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Research Matrix technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 75 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The archive is a whirl of lights and energy. Adaptive holographic displays recreate the universe in incredible detail, and explain phenomena from dimensional reflections in nebulas to subatomic life forms.[BR][BR]It is a wonder like no other and the life's work of many of our most talented citizens.[BR][BR]Sharing this information freely is a boon to our people, and every other civilization in the galaxy. They now have complete access to all of our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The archive, a whirl of lights and energy, displays the universe in detail. Sharing this information freely benefits our people and other civilizations, granting access to all our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All civilizations gain all our known technologies.[BR][ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +75 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exotic animals live in freedom and comfort in open environments designed for their needs. The first civilization to construct it will earn the admiration of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exotic animals live in freedom and comfort in open environments designed for their needs. The first civilization to construct it will earn the admiration of the galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 7 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Dec
StringTable.String: Towering bioluminescent trees provide sanctuary and healing to all who wander through this tranquil garden.[BR][BR]Other civilizations race to complete this perfect garden as well. Once finished, legends of it will spread throughout the galaxy and any secondary attempts will seem like like inferior copies.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Towering bioluminescent trees provide sanctuary and healing to all who wander through this tranquil garden.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 9 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have detected a call from the edge of space. A place where dimensions intersect and something horrible from the other side is attempting to get through.[BR][BR]Our advisors warn against allowing such beings through, they are certain that it will result in the loss of thousands of lives, maybe even the loss of our homeworld.[BR][BR]Still... facing and defeating this other dimensional challenge would establish our reputation as legendary warriors, and we have never backed down from a challenge before.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Scientists detect a call from the edge of space, where dimensions intersect and something horrible tries to enter. Advisors warn against it, fearing massive loss. However, facing this challenge could establish us as legendary warriors.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the creatures to enter our dimension.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists have detected a call from the edge of space. A place where dimensions intersect and something from the other side is attempting to get through.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] 100 [HS=HS_Week]Months[/HS] played.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The DreadLords have been defeated, though it is impossible to tell if they were mere scouts into our dimension or something more horrible.[BR][BR]Regardless thousands worked together to defend our space from them. Lives were lost, but even more became heroes. Their tales, and those of the might of our civilization, will live on forever.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our battles will never be forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have discovered a legendary Arnor world on the edge of space. Called the Throne of the Arnor it is emmiting a beacon like a siren song to the rest of the galaxy.[BR][BR]The planet's influence will grow quickly and overtake the galaxy if we don't stop it.[BR][BR]They also discovered a fleet of sentinel ships designed to protect the world that won't make attacking it easy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We must find and destroy this world before it overtakes the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Another Civilization has discovered the Throne of the Arnor, a legendary world designed to control the galaxy. They have reactivated the throne and it has begun to send its message out. If we are to stop everyone from falling under its control we must destroy it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Precursor Origins technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 100 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find and Claim the 'Throne of the Arnor'

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The Throne of the Arnor has been captured.[BR][BR]We briefly considered destroying the powerful device. But it is so much more useful in our hands.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Time to use this to our advantage.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy has gone through periods of intense warfare before. But there is no return from the Apocalypse.[BR][BR]Once begun war will rage until there is only one civilization left. We will be victorious, or forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy has gone through periods of intense warfare before. But there is no return from the Apocalypse. Once begun war will rage until there is only one civilization left. We will be victorious, or forgotten.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] The Everwar galactic challenge must be completed.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 10 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS] for every Civilization defeated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Dec
StringTable.String: If we are to understand our place in the galaxy, we must first understand our immediate cosmic surroundings. Poets and philosophers alike are eager to hear news of what we find out among the stars. But some worry that we focus too much on exploring while ignoring the many problems we have at home.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can't stop exploring. But we should demonstrate that home will always be our first priority.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy is old, and we aren't the first to explore it. The more of its history and mysteries we can uncover, the better off we'll be. In the meantime, refocus our energy on highly visible improvements to our domestic infrastructure. A few shiny new buildings should satisfy everyone.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our future is among the stars.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy is old, and we aren't the first to explore it. The more off its history and mysteries we can uncover, the better of we'll be. To help with this, divert some of our efforts to ship construction and ship maintenance and other things related to ships.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our exploration efforts have been a great success, and have led to the discovery of seven new anomalies. If they had any doubts before, those are long gone; our people now long to learn more about deep space.[BR][BR]Is there anything we should do to focus this new found enthusiasm?

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Continue our exploration efforts. Even more treasures await us out there.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make the most of the resources our ships have discovered.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Turn the data we've gathered over to our scientists.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Dec
StringTable.String: We have encountered the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. As of yet we've been unable to communicate with them, but our scientists claim that they can develop universal translation technology if they are given the time and resources.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We'll assign our scientists the task when we have time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the 'A Way to Communicate' mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists need to discover a way to communicate with aliens if we are to have any hope of existing peacefully with them. Or knowing what they're saying before the shooting starts.[BR][BR]Reward: 10 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Points[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should contract a private corporation to do the work.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have discovered aliens in the universe but we have no way to communicate with them. Rather than pull our scientists from their other work, we have offered a substantial reward to any private corporation that can provide the technology.[BR][BR]Reward: Universal Translator technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have created a universal translator that will allow us to communicate with all the species we encounter.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Hopefully we'll like what they have to say.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Dec
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop the Universal Translator has had a setback. They have a prototype which works, but it's biased to use translations with the most negative connotations possible. Our diplomats warn this will surely cause us embarrassment, if it doesn't start a war. The corporation is confident that with more funding they can resolve the issue.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Negative is fine, we're mainly just going to use it to declare war anyway.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Give them more time to work on the project.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop the Universal Translator has had a setback. Classic. We have provided them more funding to complete the job.[BR][BR]Reward: Universal Translator technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Cancel the project. We'll get our scientists to research it instead.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the 'A Way to Communicate' mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists need to discover a way to communicate with alien species if we are to have any hope of existing peacefully with them.[BR][BR]Reward: 10 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Points[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Dec
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop a universal translator has succeeded. This will allow us to communicate with all the species we encounter.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's hope the corporation didn't embed too much product placement.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Our society is at a crossroads. While our citizens are excited at the progress we have made as a civilization, they remain fearful and uncertain about what will happen next. Our advisors believe they need to see that we have a direction. We should establish a new public mission to clearly communicate what our goals are.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will colonize new worlds, so that we become true citizens of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to colonize three worlds

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have committed to our citizens that we will establish colonies on three new worlds, whether those worlds like it or not.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will discover new technology, to help us survive the challenges of the next era.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to research five technologies

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have overcome the challenges our homeworld has presented us, but the galaxy is infinitely more complex and dangerous. If we are to survive, it will be by out wits and our brains.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will claim space, and the resources and wonders within. We will see our influence spread between the stars.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to construct three starbases

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our destiny lies not just on the surface of planets, but in space itself. It is critical that we establish the boundaries of our empire before other species set our borders for us.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and colonized three new worlds. Our people - at home and abroad - celebrate our achievement.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End1_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The people like us when we send them away? Good to know...

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and researched five new technologies. Dazzled by these technological feats, our people celebrate their own brilliance.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: But now all our old stuff seems out of date. Ahh, well.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and constructed three new starbases, expanding our borders further than ever before. Our people celebrate our newly expanded horizons.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End3_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I bet our enemies aren't celebrating though.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Dec
StringTable.String: Our media is reporting that the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are oppressing a minor religious group that is spreading on their worlds. Many of our citizens - including a few in the government - want us to intervene, but any such action would obviously cause friction with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Release a statement in support of religious tolerance. Direct it explicitly at the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Contact the {PLAYERFACTION:1} and ask how we can support them during this crisis.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Stay out of it. This is none of our business. Even if our people don't like it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Dec
StringTable.String: Our support has emboldened the new religious group operating in {PLAYERFACTION:1} space, and led to a violent clash between them and their government. Images of burning buildings and beaten {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens fill our news channels.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send medical supplies. We had a part in causing this violence, we should help resolve it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You incited disorder in our empire

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Attempt to broker peace between the {PLAYERFACTION:1} and their wayward religious followers.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuasion ability check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Explicitly condemn the followers of the religion.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a wide gulf between freedom and control, but you bridge the two with a speech that calls on both sides to forget their past and build a better future. The gap is also somewhat bridged with the help of money, in the form of improved trade opportunities for both sides. Our citizens celebrate, having seen proof of our leadership and moral clarity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Interfering in other cultures always works, strange that people don't do it more often.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You calmed riots in our lands

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sanctimonious cries for tolerance infuriate the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. They jail thousands of their religious zealots and accuse us of spreading propaganda to destabilize their government. It's going to be a long time until they forget what we've done.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You caused riots in our lands

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} are somewhat aloof when we offer aid. They deny that there is any real issue with the religion's followers, and claim that the media has distorted the size of the protests. They are either in denial or unwilling to admit that they need help.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We cannot help those that don't want help. Leave it alone even though our citizens won't like it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Release a statement in support of religious tolerance directed at the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} meet our medical supply ships at the edge of their empire. They refuse to allow us to enter and threaten to destroy our ships if they continue forward.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They're bluffing, get those supplies to the people in need.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Intimidation ability check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This isn't worth risking bloodshed. Certainly not our blood. Turn back even if it will disappoint our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The citizens of two empires watch as our medical ships pass through the blockade. Though the {PLAYERFACTION:1} ships arm their weapons and target our vessels, they never fire. Days later we're rewarded with images of persecuted religious followers receiving aid - our flag and language prominently visible - and the celebration of our people.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Interfering in other cultures always works, strange that people don't do it more often.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Dec
