StringTable.String: Our citizens celebrate as our spawn are born in welcoming oceans across the galaxy. Though each sea is filled with new life and discovery, we are a part of all of them.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are truly a galactic empire.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Dec
StringTable.String: Blessed greetings, alien one. We have a small matter we could use your assistance with. The pirates in this region plague our people on their travels. Can you assist us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Burran have asked us to help exterminate the pirates that threaten their ships.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Burran and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Thank you, kindhearted alien. The rumors about your kind were true. As you have aided us, please allow us to aid you and your people as you face the rigors in your own lives.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Durantium would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Name
StringTable.String: Orphic Prime of the Orphica Enclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Dec
StringTable.String: Unconsolidated being, you may assist us/me and we/I will assist you. Provide us/me disassembled precursor sentinels for my/our inspection.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Orphica Enclave have asked us to gather components from Precursor Sentinel ships in the region.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Orphica Enclave and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Name
StringTable.String: Orphic Prime of the Orphica Enclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your work is acknowledged, unconsolidated being. The Orphic Enclave shall assist you in various matters.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Thulium would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Dec
StringTable.String: You, alien. Are you the ones we fear and hate? The ones who stole our children? Or are you better? Or worse? Can you help us find them? Survey anomalies in the area. Tell us what you find.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Klepart have asked us to help explore the galaxy and survey more anomalies.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Klepart and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Dec
StringTable.String: You have done what we asked, when many aliens would not. We trust you, alien, and wish to make peace with you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Techapod Hives would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Name
StringTable.String: Keeper Quin of the Kaxx Collective

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Dec
StringTable.String: Hello. Your people have expertise in matters technological. Ones outside our knowledge. We have need for your wisdom. Could you complete a small project for us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Kaxx Collective have asked us to decipher strange writing found at the core of our world.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Kaxx Collective and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Name
StringTable.String: Keeper Quin of the Kaxx Collective

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your work has taught us much, and if what it says about the sacred being who dwells in our world is true, it augers well for the fate of the universe. We would like to work more with you in the future.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Xanthium Deposits would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Name
StringTable.String: Dustman Cole of the Odair Conclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Dec
StringTable.String: Do you know what we should do, alien? Destroy something beautiful. What's the point of it anyways? There are beasts in this region. Destroy them and I'll know you feel the same.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Odair Conclave have asked us to help exterminate the space monsters that threaten their ships.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Odair Conclave and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Name
StringTable.String: Dustman Cole of the Odair Conclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Dec
StringTable.String: I'm not impressed alien, because nothing impresses me. But it's good to see you leave behind nothing where was there was something. I think we'll get along, during whatever time this universe has left.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Antimatter would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Dec
StringTable.String: Hey you, look. Here's the thing. We need Crucible Vapors. We don't want it. We need it. Help us, and we'll think about starting to help you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Lantern have asked us to help to build a plant that produces an addictive substance, Crucible Vapors.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Lantern and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Dec
StringTable.String: You did it. That's amazing. We are on board with what you're doing and how you're doing it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Harmony Crystals would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CollectiveConsciousness_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhance the strength and cohesiveness of the collective consciousness.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceProbe_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel deeper into the galaxy than our manned vessels, and transmit back information about what it finds.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceProbeMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel deeper into the galaxy than our manned vessels, and transmit back information about what it finds.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceProbeSensorRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel deeper into the galaxy than our manned vessels, and transmit back information about what it finds.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceAsteroid_Dec
StringTable.String: Establishes mining bases when sent to an asteroid field.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range space superiority fighter equipped with a beam weapon.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSniperX_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range space superiority fighter equipped with a beam weapon.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range space superiority fighter armed with missiles.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range space superiority fighter equipped with a kinetic-based attack.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCaretaker_Dec
StringTable.String: Little more than a repair bay with wings, this ship maintains the rest of the fleet, but has no weapons of its own.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceAssaultFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Fast and deadly. Designed to get to the enemy fast, and take out high value targets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDroneFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Remotely piloted and designed for close-range combat. Seeks out and destroys enemy Support ships.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceGuardianFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny but tough, these drones will defend your support ships to the end.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSpearman_Dec
StringTable.String: Area patrol ship designed with a formidable missile attack system.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCutter_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid-range ship set up for beam weapons and shields. It's earned its name.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDefender_Dec
StringTable.String: Area patrol ship designed with a formidable missile attack system.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Area patrol ship with mass-driver based weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Precursor Survey Module, this ship is designed to explore anomalies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSurveyMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Precursor Survey Module, this ship is designed to explore anomalies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSurveySensorRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Precursor Survey Module, this ship is designed to explore anomalies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceHeavySurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: A better armed and armored survey ship, for when discovery gets dangerous.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCorvette_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCorvetteEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size beam-warfare ship. If you need a lot of things burnt very quickly, this is your ship.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceRanger_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceRangerEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size missile-warfare ship. Can put a lot of missiles into space very quickly.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-hulled dominance ship designed to protect large areas of space with kinetic-based weaponry.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceFrigateEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-hulled dominance ship designed to protect large areas of space with enhanced kinetic-based weaponry.

StringTable.Label: TerranAlliancePaladin_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: TerranAlliancePaladinEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium-size combat ship of balanced capabilities. Could form the backbone of any fleet.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Premiere area dominance starship designed to control parsecs of space with its deadly beam energy weapons.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCruiserEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Premiere area dominance starship designed to control parsecs of space with its deadly beam energy weapons.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Powerful area dominance starship designed to control parsecs of space with its missile-based weapons.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDestroyerEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Powerful area dominance starship designed to control parsecs of space with its missile-based weapons.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy into enemies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceBattleshipEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to enemies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly assault fighters that seek to destroy high-value enemy targets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceAvatar_Dec
StringTable.String: Enormous vessel designed for beam combat. Doesn't play nice with others.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceAvatarEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Enormous vessel designed for beam combat. Doesn't play nice with others.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceFortress_Dec
StringTable.String: Massive vessel designed for missile combat. So, so many missiles.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceFortressEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Massive vessel designed for missile combat. So, so many missiles.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDreadnought_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceDreadnoughtEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Gigantic vessel designed for kinetic warfare. Will lower property values anywhere it shows up.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceTitan_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanic vessel designed for all forms of warfare. Capable of killing you in many, many ways.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceTitanEnhanced_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanic vessel designed for all forms of warfare. Capable of killing you in many, many ways.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceAssaultCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries fast and deadly assault fighters that seek to destroy high-value enemy targets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, equipped to colonize distant planets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceConstructor_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship capable of building starbases.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceUnitTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Unarmed transport used to ferry Important Citizens between worlds.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceFreighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, used to establish trade routes with distant worlds.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceTransport_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, packed with troops and vehicles, built to invade unfriendly planets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceSiege_Dec
StringTable.String: Large ship fitted with weapons for orbital bombardment. Useful during planetary invasions.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceStartingSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with a Precursor Survey Module, this ship is designed to explore anomalies.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceStartingColony_Dec
StringTable.String: Large but fragile ship, equipped to colonize distant planets.

StringTable.Label: TerranAllianceStartingProbe_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel deeper into the galaxy than our manned vessels, and transmit back information about what it finds.

StringTable.Label: PirateStartingSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range, and set up for missile combat. A mean little torpedo boat.

StringTable.Label: PirateStartingBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range, and set up for missile combat. A mean little torpedo boat.

StringTable.Label: SentinelBomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range and set up for missile combat. A mean little torpedo boat.

StringTable.Label: SentinelAssaultFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Fast and deadly, designed to get to the enemy fast and take out high value targets.

StringTable.Label: SentinelDroneFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Remotely piloted and designed for close range combat, and seeking out and destroying Enemy Support ships.

StringTable.Label: SentinelGuardianFighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny but tuff, these drones will defend your support ships to the end, and not cost any lives.

StringTable.Label: SentinelDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Large missile-combat platform capable of spewing forth clouds of deadly missiles.

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonsterGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: Short range, optimized for kinetic combat. An ornery little stone thrower.

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonsterGunboat_Dec
StringTable.String: Mid range shootist, arrayed with kinetic weapons and armor. A mean, mean ship.

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonsterFrigate_Dec
StringTable.String: Medium size kinetic-warfare ship. The larger the slug-thrower, the larger the slugs.

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonsterBattleship_Dec
StringTable.String: Large kinetic-combat platform, capable of delivering massive amounts of kinetic energy to things it doesn't like.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordSniper_Dec
StringTable.String: The Claw of the Dread Lords.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordSniperX_Dec
StringTable.String: The Claw of the Dread Lords.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordGuardian_Dec
StringTable.String: The Claw of the Dread Lords.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordCaretaker_Dec
StringTable.String: The Claw of the Dread Lords.

StringTable.Label: SurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: The Q-1 Survey module was constructed from Precursor technologies that were discovered at a dig site several years prior. This unique device allows the ship to investigate interstellar anomalies. Don't lose it.

StringTable.Label: StartingSurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Believed to have been constructed by the Precursors before being found by the current user, Survey modules make use of exotic technologies to penetrate the mysteries of interstellar anomalies.

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: PlasmaXe_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000A-X Omni Plasma Pod.[BR][BR]Using 130 Terawatts of power, this plasma based weapon system provides moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PhasedCannons_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M3KA1 Phased energy weapon system.[BR][BR]Delivering 175 Terawatts of power this phased energy weapon system, like all beam weapon systems, provides moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: DoomRay_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse MX-Z1 Phased "Doom" ray.[BR][BR]How this weapon system works is top secret. Even for you.

StringTable.Label: Missile_HypersonicMissile_Dec
StringTable.String: Banthar M1 Space Missile.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Stinger_Dec
StringTable.String: Enables short range missile attack.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalMissile_Dec
StringTable.String: Enables medium range missile attack.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Harpoon_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox M-4 "Avenger" missile.[BR][BR]Delivers a nuclear payload. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Phoenix_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Phoenix" Medium Missile[BR][BR]The Sandrala uses a fusion based nuclear reaction to do substantial damage.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarhead_Dec
StringTable.String: Melera Heavy "Photonic" warhead.[BR][BR]The Melera delivers a devastating fusion reaction to the enemy.

StringTable.Label: HarpoonX_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox M-4X "Harpoon" missile. Enables short range missile attack.[BR][BR]Delivers an antimatter payload. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhoenixX_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheonix "Matadrox" Medium Missile.[BR][BR]Delivers an antimatter based warhead. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarheadX_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhanced Melera "Photonic" warhead.[BR][BR]The Enhanced Melera adds a fragment of antimatter to intensify the reaction.

StringTable.Label: TritonTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: GH-32 "Triton" Stellar Torpedo requires antimatter for its massive destructive capability.

StringTable.Label: NightmareTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheonix Mk 76 "Nightmare" Stellar Torpedo creates temporary weaknesses in the fabric of space-time to deliver massive damage to the enemy.

StringTable.Label: Cannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Mk III "Star" cannon.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.String: General Destruction Pulse Cannon Mk I.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Graviton "Gun" uses exotic materials to deliver a high rate of fire to decimate enemy hulls.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: PulseCannonX_Dec
StringTable.String: The General Destruction Mk I Railgun integrates a fragment of Thulium to greatly increase the density of the projectile.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: MassDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction "Shredder" Pulse Cannon. Uses Thulium to increase projectile density.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Enhanced "Vulcan" gun makes use of Thulium to deliver more mass to the target without increasing the side of the ordinance.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: QuantumDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc "Quantum" Driver Mk-I. Originally used to shatter subspace stream focal points, the Quantum driver makes a very potent weapon system.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: SingularityDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc Blackhole Projector.[BR][BR]Fires a singularity fragment (a tiny blackhole) at the enemy. Contact results in massive damage.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_HitPointsCap_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ship's most valuable asset is a dedicated crew that is prepared for any emergency.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Moves_Dec
StringTable.String: By improving the tools at our helm we can make our ship more effective and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_SensorRange_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater range of sensor equipment will allow us to discover more of the galaxy's wonder, and avoid its threats.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_BeamUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We can increase the power of our lasers by powering them with elerium.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_MissileUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Even small samples of antimatter can improve the detonation of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_KineticUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanium and aluminum alloys are quickly shredded by durantium composite munitions.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_AIController_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing the AI to run our critical systems leaves us less to manage.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_VirtualBridge_Dec
StringTable.String: By replaying battles our crew can learn more from our victories.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Cantena_Dec
StringTable.String: A place for our crew to relax, unwind and establish the bonds that will aid them in battle.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ImmuneNebula_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes all ships in fleet immune to damaging Nebula Effects.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_DroneCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 2 small but nasty Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: BattleshipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Battleship class ships.

StringTable.Label: FighterModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Fighter class ships.

StringTable.Label: BomberModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Bomber class ships.

StringTable.Label: FrigateModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Destroyer class ships.

StringTable.Label: CruiserModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Cruiser class ships.

StringTable.Label: DreadnoughtModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Dreadnought class ships.

StringTable.Label: SiegeModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Siege class ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorParticleBeam_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor Hyperion Shrunken Particle Beam.[BR][BR]This [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapon[/HS] is unusually small for its power and cost.

StringTable.Label: GaussCannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Novatron G-7 "Pulsar Punch" Gauss Cannon.[BR][BR]Utilizes magnetic fields to accelerate projectiles to devastating speeds. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic weapons[/HS] offer solid damage output and reliability in the heat of battle.

StringTable.Label: HeliosRockets_Dec
StringTable.String: Celestitech H-9 "Sun Scorcher" Helios Rockets.[BR][BR]Propels explosive projectiles with intense thrust, capable of significant damage. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] offer a balanced mix of range and destructive potential.

StringTable.Label: NeutrinoBeamEmitter_Dec
StringTable.String: Astrotech N-3 "Void Vaporizer" Neutrino Beam Emitter.[BR][BR]Emits a concentrated beam of neutrinos capable of tearing through hulls. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide formidable stopping power at a trade-off for range.

StringTable.Label: Component_PrecursorBoostEngine_Dec
StringTable.String: This ancient, salvaged Precursor engine is remarkably small for its power and cost.

StringTable.Label: WeaponJammer_Dec
StringTable.String: Versala Corp K-305 Standard Jammer. Uses Quantum entanglement to disrupt the probability of enemy ships being able to accurate target the ship.

StringTable.Label: TargetingComputer_Dec
StringTable.String: Elos Ltd. TX-5 Targeting Computer. Distributes a series of quantum nodes into a wide arc to create a sort of dynamic radio telescope, increasing the accuracy of the weapons using it.

StringTable.Label: PestMotherModule_Dec
StringTable.String: The Pest Mother can shed her parasites. They make a devastating invasion force.

StringTable.Label: Component_DigestionBattery_Dec
StringTable.String: Restores [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] 40 Hitpoints after every battle victory.

StringTable.Label: Component_MetamorphosedHide_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a random modifier to [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] Hitpoints between -50% and 50%. Recalculated after each victory.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Probe_Dec
StringTable.String: With unlimited range, Probes can be used to explore the galaxy. They have a large sensor range and are ignored by pirates and monsters.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Miner_Dec
StringTable.String: Asteroid Miners mine asteroids and increases the [HS=HS_NaturalResources]Minerals[/HS] of nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Survey_Dec
StringTable.String: Flag ships are used to survey [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] and uncover the mysteries and wonders of the universe.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Fighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Fighters are small, manueverable ships that target other fighters first and then will go after the big capital ships which are vulnerable to being swarmed.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Bomber_Dec
StringTable.String: Bombers are small, manueverable ships that go after the big capital ships which are vulnerable to being swarmed.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Frigate_Dec
StringTable.String: A small ship with a light armament.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Cruiser_Dec
StringTable.String: A medium sized warship with support for multiple weapons.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Battleship_Dec
StringTable.String: A large warship with an incredible array of offensive and defensive capabilities.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Dreadnought_Dec
StringTable.String: The largest and most dangerous warships in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Colony_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony ships are used to colonize new worlds.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Constructor_Dec
StringTable.String: Constructors are used to build Starbases which can claim nearby resources and relics, provide economic support to nearby planets and generally expands the influence of your civilization.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Freighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Establishes trade routes with worlds of other civilizations, which improves relations and [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS].

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_SupplyShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Supply Ships transport goods to [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] you control, providing a production boost to that world.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Siege_Dec
StringTable.String: A warship designed to be able to conquer colonies.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Invader_Dec
StringTable.String: A transport ship full of soldiers to conquer entire worlds.

StringTable.Label: PresetCategory_Mercenary_Dec
StringTable.String: A unique ship in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: NEW_DESIGN_BENEFITS_LABEL_Probe
StringTable.String: Ignored by pirates and space monsters

StringTable.Label: NEW_DESIGN_BENEFITS_LABEL_Undeclared
StringTable.String: Upgrade with specific class in order to build

StringTable.Label: Tiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Fragile, but cheap hull size. Ideal for tiny ships like scouts and fighters.

StringTable.Label: Small_Dec
StringTable.String: Ideal hull size for smaller assault ships and escorts.

StringTable.Label: Medium_Dec
StringTable.String: Ideal hull size for smaller Capital ships and larger Escorts.

StringTable.Label: Large_Dec
StringTable.String: Expensive, but tough hull size, with the carrying capacity to do just about anything.

StringTable.Label: Huge_Dec
StringTable.String: Hull size designed for the ultimate war ships, expensive, but capable of carrying a small fleet of armaments on its own.

StringTable.Label: Cargo_Dec
StringTable.String: Fragile hull size, and not meant for battle. Used to create ships like Colony Ships and Constructors.

StringTable.Label: Starbase_Dec
StringTable.String: Hull Used to design new starbases.

StringTable.Label: AtWarWithAll_Description
StringTable.String: Players are perpetually at war with all players. Will not make peace.

StringTable.Label: AtWarWithThoseAtWar_Label
StringTable.String: At War With Those At War

StringTable.Label: AtWarWithThoseAtWar_Description
StringTable.String: Declares war on those who are at war.

StringTable.Label: SuicidalAttack_Description
StringTable.String: Will attack their enemies even if the odds are against them.

StringTable.Label: DoesNotTrade_Description
StringTable.String: Will not trade with other players.

StringTable.Label: DoesNotSpeakToPlayer_Description
StringTable.String: Will not trade or speak to player.

StringTable.Label: LeashedShips_Description
StringTable.String: Ships must stay within range of their bases.

StringTable.Label: DoesNotMakeTreaties_Description
StringTable.String: Cannot make treaties with other players

StringTable.Label: StarbaseDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Boost the defensive capabilities of any type of starbase.

StringTable.Label: StarbaseDefenseSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the defensive capabilities of any type of starbase.

StringTable.Label: OmegaStarbaseDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: All the weapons we can fit without specializing.

StringTable.Label: OmegaStarbaseDefenseSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All the weapons we can fit without specializing.

StringTable.Label: HarpoonSavoModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a Harpoon Salvo and the ability to attack enemies up to 3 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicTorpedoArrayModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a Harpoon Salvo and the ability to attack enemies up to 5 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: NightmareDeliverySystemModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a Harpoon Salvo and the ability to attack enemies up to 7 tiles away.

StringTable.Label: AereonMissileDefenseModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds an Aereon Missile Defense System

StringTable.Label: AereonMissileDefenseModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds an Aereon Missile Defense System

StringTable.Label: XenoArcheologyLabModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows any starbase to study Precursor Relics and Ascension gates.

StringTable.Label: XenoArcheologyLabModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows any starbase to study Precursor Relics and Ascension gates.

StringTable.Label: SupportFieldStabilizationModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Extends Starbases Area of Effect by 2

StringTable.Label: StarbaseFortificationModule_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: InterstellarDefenseModule_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: ZalonDefenseSystemModule_Dec

StringTable.Label: ZalonDefenseSystemModule_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: TechapodMining_Dec
StringTable.String: In addition to our standard mining abilities, we can also extend them by using Techapods. If we have any.

StringTable.Label: MiningRingModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicates starbase to mining nearby [HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MiningRingModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Focuses on maximizing mining nearby resources

StringTable.Label: PromethionExtractorModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Boost Yields of attached Promethion Resources

StringTable.Label: EleriumExtractorModule_ShortDec
